access: Guests will have full access to the entire private lower level floor through their own keyless private entrance. Also, access to the common spaces (Kitchen & upstairs living room).
description:
Make yourself at home with your own private floor that’s spacious, modern & spotless in Ukrainian Village. The private floor has its own bathroom w/ shower, 2 bedrooms with comfy queen size beds, closets and a living room designed to relax & have fun. 

Located within blocks of Ukrainian Village’s top spots to grab drinks and some delicious food. 

In-unit washer & dryer, TV w/ Chromecast and Roku, connected w/ our fast 150mbps Wi-Fi. 

My wife speaks Mandarin Chinese if you need help.

Our condo has high ceilings and is modern and cozy with the entire lower level just being updated. Make yourself at home and easily come and go at your leisure through your own private entrance that is completely keyless. No more worrying about keys. 

There are two bedrooms on the lower level both of which have comfy queen size beds, hardwood floors and a large closet. One bedroom does have a desk and chair. 

There is also a full bathroom with a large shower, fully stocked with fluffy towels, toiletries and shampoo.  

The lower level living room has hardwood floors, a cozy sectional couch, TV, Foosball, darts, high-top table, mini fridge, and complimentary Nespresso! 

Feel free to use the common area to cook up some food in our kitchen. The kitchen is located up the stairs with full Granite counter-tops, and stainless steel appliances. There will be dish soap and sponges available, so please wash anything that has been used.

Guests will have full access to the entire private lower level floor through their own keyless private entrance. Also, access to the common spaces (Kitchen & upstairs living room).

My wife and I are right upstairs or a phone call away if you need us.

Ukrainian Village is filled with great restaurants, from contemporary American spots to places with heartwarming ramen. With a strong history and a largely Eastern European population, there's also a few Polish spots among upscale American restaurants that have found their home in the vibrant community. Voted "2016 hottest neighborhood in the US!" take a stroll through the neighborhood and stop at one of the many restaurants, stores or easily catch the CTA Blue Line ("L") into downtown!

Within walking distances of Ukrainian Village's top restaurant and bars. 

There are also two bus stops within a block that with either go down Division or up California to Chicago's other hot locations. 

Additionally, Uber's and Lyft's are available at all times and can get you to Chicago's main attractions within minutes.

Plenty of free street parking close by, however, we do have a spot in the back of our condo if parking is ever limited. Please contact us for additional assistance.
house_rules:
- Self check-in and out with keyless entry
- No shoes in the house please
- Please be respectful of noise levels, especially after 9PM. 
- Smoking Outside is permitted. 
- No extra guests without permission
interaction: My wife and I are right upstairs or a phone call away if you need us.
neighborhood_overview: Ukrainian Village is filled with great restaurants, from contemporary American spots to places with heartwarming ramen. With a strong history and a largely Eastern European population, there's also a few Polish spots among upscale American restaurants that have found their home in the vibrant community. Voted "2016 hottest neighborhood in the US!" take a stroll through the neighborhood and stop at one of the many restaurants, stores or easily catch the CTA Blue Line ("L") into downtown!
notes: Plenty of free street parking close by, however, we do have a spot in the back of our condo if parking is ever limited. Please contact us for additional assistance.
space:
Our condo has high ceilings and is modern and cozy with the entire lower level just being updated. Make yourself at home and easily come and go at your leisure through your own private entrance that is completely keyless. No more worrying about keys. 

There are two bedrooms on the lower level both of which have comfy queen size beds, hardwood floors and a large closet. One bedroom does have a desk and chair. 

There is also a full bathroom with a large shower, fully stocked with fluffy towels, toiletries and shampoo.  

The lower level living room has hardwood floors, a cozy sectional couch, TV, Foosball, darts, high-top table, mini fridge, and complimentary Nespresso! 

Feel free to use the common area to cook up some food in our kitchen. The kitchen is located up the stairs with full Granite counter-tops, and stainless steel appliances. There will be dish soap and sponges available, so please wash anything that has been used.
summary:
Make yourself at home with your own private floor that’s spacious, modern & spotless in Ukrainian Village. The private floor has its own bathroom w/ shower, 2 bedrooms with comfy queen size beds, closets and a living room designed to relax & have fun. 

Located within blocks of Ukrainian Village’s top spots to grab drinks and some delicious food. 

In-unit washer & dryer, TV w/ Chromecast and Roku, connected w/ our fast 150mbps Wi-Fi. 

My wife speaks Mandarin Chinese if you need help.
transit:
Within walking distances of Ukrainian Village's top restaurant and bars. 

There are also two bus stops within a block that with either go down Division or up California to Chicago's other hot locations. 

Additionally, Uber's and Lyft's are available at all times and can get you to Chicago's main attractions within minutes.

access: You are able to use the kitchen and living room. There is a laundry room with a washer and a dryer that is free. It is located through the back door and through the back stairs on the first floor near the garage. If you are staying for a longer than a few weeks, I could appreciate if you bought your own detergent. Petes Market has small sizes.
description:
If looking for a home base for a stay in Chicago this will be great for you. It's not in a touristy neighborhood, but it's very close to downtown(2.5 miles to loop). There is a large supermarket and a bus stop conveniently located 5 houses away. Bus runs into the loop towards Millenium Park. The kitchen is set up for cooking. Free laundry in the building.  McDs, Wendys, and Subway on the corner. UberX cost to go to places is about $7-10 each way. UberPOOL is less. Bus: $2.25. Medical District.

BB2: This is a 3 bedroom and 2 bathroom apartment. All rooms are subject to Airbnb. 2 bedrooms are standard Chicago size with closets, and they share a bathroom that is located near the kitchen. The middle room is a master bedroom, and it has it's own bathroom inside (This listing is for a bedroom with a shared bathroom, bedroom has 3 windows and is located at the back of the apartment).  All guests are welcome to use the kitchen and living room mindfully. Be mindful of your own cleanliness in the common areas as this is something I am unable to control on an hourly basis or daily basis. You will have to do and put away your dishes.

You are able to use the kitchen and living room. There is a laundry room with a washer and a dryer that is free. It is located through the back door and through the back stairs on the first floor near the garage. If you are staying for a longer than a few weeks, I could appreciate if you bought your own detergent. Petes Market has small sizes.

I am friendly and helpful, but I enjoy my privacy. I am available to help most of the time and I tend to respond quickly if I am not in a mid flight.

The Near West Side , one of the 77 community areas of Chicago, is on the West Side, west of the Chicago River and adjacent to the Loop and West Loop. The history of the Near West Side of Chicago includes the founding of Hull House, a prominent settlement house. The Great Chicago Fire started in the Near West Side. The area is home to the University of Illinois at Chicago (UIC), the United Center and the Illinois Medical not a very walkable neighborhood, but bigger streets such as Madison and Western are more interesting to walk through but only after 1 mile you will hit the posh neighborhoods. Listing is on Western and Madison intersection.

My listings are very close to public transportation. The bus stop is right on the intersection and my house is 5th from a major intersection with 2 buses.  The way chicago works is that each bus goes in a straight line. Madison bus goes to downtown, loop, Sears (Willis) tower and Millennium Park, and Western bus goes to different neighborhoods such as Bucktown and Wicker Park and Medical District.  Blue line is about 8 minute walk, and also goes to downtown, loop and the airport.  Also if you get Uber and use UberPool, its only about $2.50-3$ to get around which is not that much different sometimes from public transportation prices ($2.25).

access: Entire apartment with small outside patio
description:
Newly renovated 2 bedroom apartment in the heart of Oak Park. 

Walk to Frank Lloyd Wright Home and Studio, Unity Temple and downtown Oak Park restaurants, bars and shops.  3 blocks from the CTA Green Line and METRA station. Get directly into downtown Chicago in 20 minutes. 

Private entrance, free parking, central air, large sectional sofa, TV, dining table and full kitchen with dishwasher, coffee maker, toaster, dishes, cookware;  everything you need to make yourself at home.

Private, garden level apartment accessible from outside - 5 steps down. 

Sectional sofa in living room can easily, and comfortably,  sleep up to 2 additional adults

Air mattress and pack and play (and other kid stuff) available upon request
Large TV in the living room with PlayStation, HBO, Showtime, Netflix and Hulu 
High speed Wi-Fi
Bathroom with large shower (no bathtub)
Iron and ironing board
Coffee maker, coffee, tea, milk and sugar

Entire apartment with small outside patio

Keypad entry for easy check-in and access but we are on-sight and available for any questions or concerns.  Private access in the back of the house - blue door.

Perfect location in the center of everything that makes Oak Park great.  Free parking available with rental, but location makes it easy to walk to everything you need .  The Frank Lloyd Wright Studio and Home is a 5 minute walk north through a neighborhood filled with beautiful Prairie  and Victorian homes.
Downtown Oak Park is a 5 minute walk south and full of locally owned restaurants, bars, cafes and shops.  

- Frank Lloyd Wright House & Studio  - 0.4 mile
- Trader Joe's - 0.2 mile
- Target - 0.3 mile
- Lake Street  - 0.3 mile
- Whole Foods - 0.4 miles
- Walgreen's - 0.4 miles
- CTA Greenline & Metra Station - 0.4 miles
- CVS - 0.5 miles
- Earnest Hemingway Birthplace Museum - 0.6 mile
- Earnest Hemingway Boyhood Home - 0.8 mile
- Concordia University - 0.6 mile
- Dominican University - 1.6 miles
- Brookfield Zoo  - 6.3 miles
- Downtown Chicago - 10.2 miles (10 minutes on METRA train)

Apartment is convenient to everything.  You can drive, take an UBER/Lyft or public transportation to get you anywhere you would like to go across the Chicago area.

O-Hare and Midway airports are both 20-30 minutes away by car depending on traffic.  

Very easy and convenient access  (9 minute walk) to the CTA Green Line Harlem stop and the Oak Park METRA station.   PACE bus stop at the end of the street.

There is no overnight street parking but there are 2 tandem parking spaces on the right side of the driveway available.

access: Access is available to the entire apartment.
description:
When you rent this Wicker Park brownstone, you’ll be living in the high life. Two floors, two bedrooms, a huge kitchen with an island, tons of living space, and a private rooftop deck, this neighborhood penthouse could easily be situated in the Gold Coast. Just wait til you get to the photo of the master bathroom. Right?

Access is available to the entire apartment.

We will be available throughout your stay to recommend local attractions, dining, nightlife, or any other concierge services that interest you.

A haven for hipsters and creatives, Wicker Park is overflowing with trendy things to eat, see, and do. Grab a bite at the umpteen hip restaurants or grab a bike and cruise the Bloomingdale Trail. Visit the thrift shops, book shops, coffee shops, boutique shops, beauty shops, donut shops, ramen shops, record shops, and brunch shops that line bike-friendly Milwaukee Avenue. There really are a lot of shops around here.

Cab/Uber service is easily available in this location and is our preferred method of transportation downtown. The unit is a short walk to the Chicago Blue Line at Damen that takes you directly to O'Hare or into the Loop and is also near several major bus routes.

We are not responsible for packages if they are unable to be delivered. If anything is not to your liking, please notify us, and we will correct the situation as soon as possible.
house_rules:
1. No onsite parking
2. No late checkout past 11am
3. Quiet time after 10pm
4. ONLY guests included on the reservation are permitted on the premises
5. Lost or misplaced keys will be charged at cost (up to $100)
6. We are not responsible for packages if they are unable to be delivered

We look forward to hosting you!  If you are unable to abide by house rules, please consider another listing as we reserve the right to end your stay early for serious violations.  We take pride in our home and are excited to welcome you, but please respect the space and others who live in the building.

access: You will have full access to the entire guest house as well as the patio off of the kitchen. The patio is furnished with comfortable outdoor arm chairs and a fire pit! You can also use the gas grill.
description:
Our guest house is located in the hart of Roscoe Village and walking distance to the train (brown line-Paulina stop). We are 1 mile west of Wrigley Field and a 30 minute train ride to downtown. Right outside your door are restaurants, boutique shopping & Starbucks. Enjoy breakfast in our fully equipped kitchen while making memorable conversation in the separate dining room with a table that seats six comfortably. We provide everything you need, just pack your favorite outfits and enjoy Chicago!

Super clean home. Pet and smoke free. All new furniture, bedding and linens. Newly rehabbed and fresh space!

You will have full access to the entire guest house as well as the patio off of the kitchen. The patio is furnished with comfortable outdoor arm chairs and a fire pit! You can also use the gas grill.

Its up to you! We live on the property in the main building and are available should you need anything or have questions about getting around the city or our recommendations for things to do and places to eat.

Super great neighborhood! We are in the very heart of Roscoe Village. Trendy but still quiet "A village within the city!". Family friendly with plenty for couples and singles to do as well. Really great bars with restaurants, 7 within walking distance. Excellent brunch spots on the same block. Fantastic Mediterranean & Cuban restaurants down the block. There are three neighborhood fests during the summer (see here for details and dates: http://roscoevillage.org/ )  We are a 8 min drive, 17 min bus ride or 20 min walk to Wrigley Field. United Center is a straight shot from here too! 5 mi down Damen. 20 minute drive or 30 min 1 bus ride (no transfers needed!!) We are only three blocks from the Brown Line 'el' train. 20 minutes from downtown via the train. Faster if driving.

We have free street parking on all side streets. No permits required. Bus stop across the street and the Brown Line three blocks away.

The guest house is really a great value for all it has to offer from easy and free parking to its close proximity to the trains and buses, lots of shops and four major grocery stores and two parks within walking distance. It's in a very nice and safe area. The most important thing we strive for is that you have a very comfortable stay.

There is a $100 fee for any ashtrays and/or cigarettes left outside in the patio area and walkway.

additional_house_rules:
1)No shoes in the house unless its house slippers.

2)No smoking or alcohol in the house

3)We love hosting but expect guests to respect our privacy and our home. We do have kids and elders in the house.

4) Since our kitchen is very centrally located and very busy access for guests is limited to using the microwave and fridge. For guests with weekly or longer bookings we can discuss and come to a mutually agreeable schedule to ensure our privacy is maintained

5) We would appreciate it if strong smelling perfumes, colognes or body sprays could be put on outside the house. I know this sounds funny but all strong smells trigger my husbands migraine and that ruins the day for him and me.

6) We try to conserve electricity for the planet and because its expensive so please turn off extra lights and fans if not in use.

description:
If your looking for a cozy, quiet place to stay close to Woodfield Mall and Busse wood, you just found it. We are 15 mins from ohare and 40 mins from the city. Despite being in the suburbs the house is very scenic and there is plenty for kids to do

This is a pvt room so in a big spacious house so you will run into the host but we love having guests over.

Busse woods is famous for fishing, picnics and even kayaking. Its a 5 min walk from the house

Its best to have a car and we do have plenty of parking space in our driveway. We do have plenty of restaurants, Woodfield Mall, Lego land and many other fun places in a ten minute driving radius

1)No shoes in the house unless its house slippers.

2)No smoking or alcohol in the house

3)We love hosting but expect guests to respect our privacy and our home. We do have kids and elders in the house.

4) Since our kitchen is very centrally located and very busy access for guests is limited to using the microwave and fridge. For guests with weekly or longer bookings we can discuss and come to a mutually agreeable schedule to ensure our privacy is maintained

5) We would appreciate it if strong smelling perfumes, colognes or body sprays could be put on outside the house. I know this sounds funny but all strong smells trigger my husbands migraine and that ruins the day for him and me.

6) We try to conserve electricity for the planet and because its expensive so please turn off extra lights and fans if not in use.

additional_house_rules:
Check out time is at 10:00a.m. Unscheduled late check outs will be charged a fee of $25.00/ hour and it starts 10 minutes after check out.  Check out requires leaving the entire property, not only the guest rooms. You cannot linger in the common areas. 

QUIET TIME: 10pm - 8am.  Quiet Time is not a curfew. We truly appreciate you maintaining the quiet as we have Medical Students preparing for an extremely important test to be licensed physicians. Studying requires Quiet Time. If someone is keeping you awake with loud noise, please contact me or AirBnB immediately. We will stop the noise or else note it in their guest review in exact detail. 

Thank you for not smoking on the premises!  We comply with the City of Chicago's Clean Air Ordinance by asking you to smoke 15 feet away from the property. A nice walk will be a solution. 

Early check-in is not possible. The property needs to get cleaned and prepared for new guests without the staff's work being disrupted. 

My best advice: Please return everything exactly the way you found them. 
If you break anything, please tell us immediately. We can probably fix it!
2 Security cameras are in the common areas for your protection.  

Visitors are not permitted on the property without written prior permission from the Host.

The dishwasher is to the left of the kitchen sink next to the lower cabinets. Please rinse and place them in the dishwasher for later, you do not need to clean your cups and plates. 

We recycle.  If you'd like, please leave your recycleable items on the floor near the back door next to the kitchen trash bin.  Thank you.  

Laundry service is available to only guests that stay a minimum of 2 WEEKS or more & is at the discretion of the Host. There is a fee. 

Mail forwarding to this address is not availale. Please notify us if you are expecting a package from Amazon. The postal carrier only delivers to permanent residents of the property. 

Please do not touch the security cameras. They will sound an alarm and send alerts to my phone. Also, they are extremely fragile and expensive. We hate passing that $250 replacement costs when they get broken. 

Please notify us if you are driving so that we can prevent you from getting any steep fines by directing you to a good parking zone area.  Parking is best directly in front of the house and on the cross street, Higgins, as we are the 2nd house from the corner. 

Kitchen Table: There is a Guidebook for you with information on the cover & inside.

Enjoy your trip!  :-D
name: Safest City Retreat close to USMLE/COMLEX

access:
The shared bathroom has extra toiletries, in case you forgot your own.  If you forgot to bring something with, let me know and I will probably have it for you. 
The business center has a desk, modem, phone, and a printer that you're welcome to use.  There's cable internet for you to check emails.
description:
My other listing are below:
https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/15094729?s=51
https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/22831461?s=51
https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/22598312?s=51
My place is 1 mile to USMLE/ 1.5 miles to NBOME Testing (NCCST-Chicago); 10 minutes to O'Hare Airport See below for details. Next to the highway, so you can easily drive anywhere. 0.6 miles to Harlem Blue Line.  
Early check in is available $10 for every 2.5 hours. 
Prices are subject to change.

The room is on the 1st floor, next to the bathroom. It is similar to an old fashioned European B&B. There's lots of fresh linens, foam mattress, oil paintings, a desk, a deep closet, a dresser & a luggage rack.  In the kitchen, you have a snack station (tea caddy, coffee, electric kettle, oat meal, etc) and your own shelf labeled "AirBnB" in the refrigerator.   
There's a beautiful garden and yard with a wheelchair ramp in the back, for you use.

The shared bathroom has extra toiletries, in case you forgot your own.  If you forgot to bring something with, let me know and I will probably have it for you. 
The business center has a desk, modem, phone, and a printer that you're welcome to use.  There's cable internet for you to check emails.

I'm around as much as you want. I'm happy to offer help with where to go and what to see in Chicago if you have any questions.  :-)

The neighborhood consists of single family homes, so there's lots of street parking.  It's a very quiet and extremely safe area. You will be safe walking after midnight.  It's like living in the suburbs with all the amenities of the city.  There's restaurants, a big park, a drugstore, grocery stores, banks, a library, a train/bus station, and the highway, all within walking distance.  There is a  Guidebook on this site if you don't have an app with GPS.

If you are driving, my house is literally 2 doors away from the highway.  Very easy to get anywhere quickly.  We are 6blocks to the Train station. By car, it's a 7 minute ride to the airport and 20 minutes to downtown (depending on traffic.)  The entire city & nearby suburbs are accessible by the Chicago Transit System.
Street parking with single family homes. You’ll love how the park is so near and safe. There's a beautiful garden and large yard.

*The tap water is very drinkable. Some of the best in the country. 
*There is a keypad to open the door for the BOTTOM LOCK ONLY.  There is no need to touch the top lock or anything else. After you are inside, the door self-locks. Nothing else to do. 
*I recycle.  Please rinse out anything to recycle and leave the items at the back door near the refrigerator & I'll take them from there.
*There are grab bars in the bathroom and a wheelchair ramp in the back garden.  In the summer, I sometimes sit out there.  You're welcome to sit in the garden, too.
house_rules:
Check out time is at 10:00a.m. Unscheduled late check outs will be charged a fee of $25.00/ hour and it starts 10 minutes after check out.  Check out requires leaving the entire property, not only the guest rooms. You cannot linger in the common areas. 

QUIET TIME: 10pm - 8am.  Quiet Time is not a curfew. We truly appreciate you maintaining the quiet as we have Medical Students preparing for an extremely important test to be licensed physicians. Studying requires Quiet Time. If someone is keeping you awake with loud noise, please contact me or AirBnB immediately. We will stop the noise or else note it in their guest review in exact detail. 

Thank you for not smoking on the premises!  We comply with the City of Chicago's Clean Air Ordinance by asking you to smoke 15 feet away from the property. A nice walk will be a solution. 

Early check-in is not possible. The property needs to get cleaned and prepared for new guests without the staff's work being disrupted. 

My best advice: Please return everything exactly the way you found them. 
If you break anything, please tell us immediately. We can probably fix it!
2 Security cameras are in the common areas for your protection.  

Visitors are not permitted on the property without written prior permission from the Host.

The dishwasher is to the left of the kitchen sink next to the lower cabinets. Please rinse and place them in the dishwasher for later, you do not need to clean your cups and plates. 

We recycle.  If you'd like, please leave your recycleable items on the floor near the back door next to the kitchen trash bin.  Thank you.  

Laundry service is available to only guests that stay a minimum of 2 WEEKS or more & is at the discretion of the Host. There is a fee. 

Mail forwarding to this address is not availale. Please notify us if you are expecting a package from Amazon. The postal carrier only delivers to permanent residents of the property. 

Please do not touch the security cameras. They will sound an alarm and send alerts to my phone. Also, they are extremely fragile and expensive. We hate passing that $250 replacement costs when they get broken. 

Please notify us if you are driving so that we can prevent you from getting any steep fines by directing you to a good parking zone area.  Parking is best directly in front of the house and on the cross street, Higgins, as we are the 2nd house from the corner. 

Kitchen Table: There is a Guidebook for you with information on the cover & inside.

Enjoy your trip!  :-D

description:
Feel at home wherever you choose to live with Blueground. You’ll love this comfortable Lakeview furnished three-bedroom apartment with its modern decor, fully equipped kitchen, and sophisticated living room with great balcony views. Ideally located, you’re close to all the best that Chicago has to offer! (#CHI141)

Thoughtfully designed with bespoke finishes, modern furnishings, and a fully-equipped kitchen, you’ll enjoy that “I’m home” feeling with this Blueground apartment. Whether you’re lounging in your roomy living room streaming the latest and greatest entertainment on the smart TV or premium wireless speaker, or getting some well-earned rest on the superior quality mattress with luxury linens, you’ll fall in love with everything this Lakeview apartment has to offer.  This apartment also offers in-apartment laundry.

The entire apartment is yours to enjoy! You’ll either be personally greeted by a Blueground team member or given self check-in instructions.

Throughout your stay, you’ll have access to our Client Experience team through the Blueground App. You can schedule additional cleanings, submit maintenance requests, and view our neighborhood recommendations with just a few taps.

We’ll share all details upon confirmation of your stay.

This furnished apartment is located in Lakeview, on the North Side of the city. From here, North Ravenswood Avenue is to the west and Lake Michigan is to the east. This area is important for medicine, as there are several hospitals and health centers. There’s no shortage of entertainment either. Lakeview is home to many theatres, live music venues and even Wrigley Field baseball stadium. Art and culture events take place regularly, such as the Lakeview East FestivaI and Chicago’s Gay Pride Parade. In addition to having many bus stops, Lakeview is served by six L stations of various lines, making it easy to access the rest of the city.

This Blueground apartment can be booked for a minimum of one month, to a year or more.

description:
Perfect for STUDENTS/PROFESSIONALS/VACATIONERS. Furnished room in a beautifully furnished apartment w/4 bedrooms

3 mins walk to UNIVERSITY OF CHICAGO Campus

Free street parking. 

WELCOME!!

You have free use of the Kitchen, Living Room and Dining Areas. There is also:
-Wireless Internet 
-Kodi TV 
-Washer/Dryer

additional_house_rules:
We look forward to hosting you for your stay in Chicago!  In order to make sure our expectations are clear and understood, for both the host and our Guest(s), we have created Rules for this property.  Please be mindful that this is a Home-Sharing arrangement, not a hotel, and it is my home when I stay in town.  We have other tenants in the building including long-term and short-term tenants.  In order to make sure that all tenants can enjoy their own peace and quiet - please be respectful of the property and others during your stay.   

General Rules and Regulations:
Guest(s) agrees to comply with all rules and regulations listed in this rental agreement, posted on the premises or delivered to the Guest(s).

1.	PARTIES/GATHERINGS:  Parties and/or gatherings of people are not allowed in the apartment, or on the property. 

2.	GUEST POLICY:  All overnight guests must be approved in advance through the booking process and are subject to an additional fee as noted in the price. Other than approved guests, no overnight visitors are allowed. 

3.	GENERAL CLEANLINESS:  The premises are delivered to our Guest(s) in a professionally cleaned condition.  Guest(s) agrees to maintain the premises in a reasonably clean and neat condition.  We charge a minimal Cleaning Fee and we expect our guest to respect our property and leave it in a neat and clean condition.  

4.	TRASH:  We ask Guest(s) to place all trash in the provided waste basket and dispose of the trash when the trash is full or emitting strong odors

5.	PARKING: Only park in the parking space assigned to you for your stay. 

6.	SMOKING/DRUG POLICY/MARIJUANA:  There is no smoking or use of illegal drugs allowed by Guest(s) or anyone staying in the apartment, anywhere in the premises or the property. Marijuana may, or may not, be legal in Illinois, however it is not allowed to be used or consumed anywhere on our property.

7.	CANDLES:  Candles are not allowed on the premises.

8.	DAMAGE:  Guest(s) agrees to assume all risk of damage to all personal property on the premises, including household furniture, electronics and appliances.  Please immediately report to host any accidental damage to property. 

9.	TOWELS:  We provide clean bath towels, wash clothes, and face towels.  Normal wear & tear is expected, but please do not use the towels to remove makeup (we provide makeup wipes), wipe the floor, or any purpose other than their intended purpose.

10.	LINENS/CLEANING/CONSUMABLES:  If your stay is one week or more, we will provide clean linens and towels upon request.  Consumables such as coffee, tea, sugar, shampoo, soap, etc. are always available during your stay upon request.  Please request refills when necessary

11.	NOISE:  Guest(s) and occupants shall not:  disturb, annoy, endanger or interfere with other Guest(s)s of the building or its neighbors,  Guest(s) and occupants shall not make or permit any disturbing noise in the premises or on the property that will interfere with the quiet enjoyment and comfort of  other residents and neighbors.  Loud music, television, and voices are not allowed. 


12.	QUIET HOURS:   It is important that Guest(s)s and occupants shall not disturb the quiet enjoyment of any other tenant in the building or surrounding neighbors. The Guest(s) and occupants must adhere to the building’s quiet hours. QUIET HOURS ARE IN EFFECT FROM 9 p.m. to 9 a.m. each day.  During these hours Guest(s)s and occupants should be especially mindful of noise coming from their unit.  For example, TV and Music should be kept at a low volume and shoes should be removed when walking in the apartment.  Additionally, cooking which emits strong odors should be avoided.  

13.	LAWS AND ORDINANCES:  Guest(s) and occupants shall not violate any law or ordinance or commit waste or nuisance on or about the premises.

14.	LANGUAGE AND BEHAVIOR:  Guest(s)s and occupants shall not use profane, obscene, loud or boisterous language or behavior.

15.	FURNITURE:  Do not move furniture - even if you intend to put them back after your stay.

16.	COMMERCIAL USE:  Guest(s) and occupants shall not use the premises for any commercial purpose. 

17.	APPLIANCES:  No appliances of any kind are allowed to be brought onto the property. This includes but is not limited to space heaters, portable air conditioners, dehumidifiers, etc.

18.	EMERGENCY ENTRANCE:  Guest(s) acknowledges that Owner or owner’s agents may enter the premises in the event of an emergency or other health and safety matters needing immediate attention.

19.	ITEMS LEFT BEHIND:  Owners are not responsible for items left behind by guest. If owners are asked to send left behind items, the Guest(s) is responsible for full payment of shipping and handling fees.

Check-Out Procedures:
Check-out must be done by 11 am on check-out day.  Prior to check-out please do the following:
•	CLEANLINESS:  The premises are delivered to Guest(s) in a professionally cleaned condition.  Guest(s) agrees to maintain the premises in a reasonably clean condition during their stay and upon checkout.  
•	BEDS/LINENS/TOWELS:  Beds don’t need to be made, floors don’t need to be swept, and towels and linens don’t need to be washed.  Please leave all dirty/used towels in the bathroom.
•	KITCHEN/DISHES:  please re-organize kitchen inventory and place your dirty dishes inside the dishwasher or inside the sink (if no dishwasher).
•	OTHER:  please close and lock all windows and close blinds.  Please turn off all lights and small appliances.
•	DAMAGE:  Report any damaged or missing items to your Hosts.

access: You will have the entire apartment to yourself. We will provide instructions for access to the apartment via a lockbox which will be available 24/7.
description:
Everything is new in this fully renovated studio apartment in a vintage 1926 building. Easy and fast public transportation to downtown Chicago with three train lines within walking distance.  Centrally located in downtown Forest Park where you will find dining, shopping and great nightlife. Historic Oak Park is just across the street.  Easy access to/from O'Hare and Midway airports.  Pets OK w/ pre-approval (contact host).

The apartment is located in a  building with six retail storefronts on the ground level and six apartments on the second floor. I own and manage this building. The apartment recently underwent a complete renovation in 2017 and everything is new.  The apartment features a queen bed and there is a sofa sleeper if you need an additonal bed.  The bedding and linens are new and comfortable. The kitchen is stocked with everything you will need to prepare a meal or to use regularly during a long-term stay.  Parking is available on the property.  Pets are welcome with pre-approval (contact host).

We have allocated five of our apartments to our Airbnb Lodging Portfolio.  We provide professionally cleaned linens.  The apartment is professionally cleaned after each guest and we keep it spotless.  The kitchen is stocked with everything you will need for a long-term stay.  We provide a smart tv (Roku) and high-speed wireless internet.  We provide a desk and chair for if you need to work from home.  If you are staying longer than a week - we provide fresh linens and towels as needed.  We maintain a management office on-site and are available to assist you during business hours.  These apartments are perfect for a weekend getaway, a long vacation, or a visit to town for business.

You will have the entire apartment to yourself. We will provide instructions for access to the apartment via a lockbox which will be available 24/7.

I own the building and a business located in the building. We have a management office onsite and we will be available during business hours to assist you in any way. After business hours, we will try to assist you when needed.

OAK PARK:  Located just ten miles west of downtown Chicago - Oak Park has long been considered one of the most architecturally significant villages in the United States. Home to the world's largest collection of Frank Lloyd Wright architecture and a number of acclaimed structures built by his contemporaries, the Oak Park Area is a treasure trove of Prairie style marvels that went on to shape architectural practices across the country. Today, comfortable Victorian homes stand in Oak Park alongside Prairie style structures designed by Frank Lloyd Wright and his contemporaries.  

FOREST PARK:  Forest Park is located just outside of Chicago and next to historic Oak Park. Located just ten miles west of downtown Chicago, Forest Park is a vibrant, active and diverse community rich in history and small-town charm with an urban feeling.

This apartments is a short walk to downtown Forest Park, downtown Oak Park, and the Oak Park Historic Districts.  And you have multiple transportation options to get you to downtown Chicago.   Just park your car and explore without parking worries!  

The apartment is located in close proximity to 3 train lines with fast service to downtown Chicago:  

BLUE LINE CTA:  is a 5 minute walk to the Harlem/Lake Blue Line Station in Forest Park. The Blue Line arrives in downtown Chicago (various stations) in approximately 23 minutes and then goes on to O’Hare Airport.  

GREEN LINE CTA:  is a 7 minute walk to the Harlem/Lake Green Line Station in Oak Park. The Green Line arrives in downtown Chicago (various stations) in approximately 26 minutes.  

METRA:  The Metra (Suburban Train Line) is a 7 minute walk to the Harlem/Lake Metra Station.  The Metra train line arrives in downtown Chicago (Ogilvie Transportation Center) in approximately 15 minutes. 

PARKING: We have parking on the property if you arrive by vehicle. Please coordinate parking with the Host prior to your arrival.  

AIRPORTS:  The apartment is centrally located between Midway and O’Hare airports.  O’Hare is about 20-25 minutes by car.  Midway is about 30-35 minutes by car.   You can get to and from O’Hare Airport using the Blue Line CTA which runs 24/7 between Forest Park and O’Hare Airport.

The apartment is on the second floor requiring one flight of stairs to climb.

access:
You have access to the whole boat and its adjacent dock. Feel free to store your perishables in the fridge.

In addition to the on-board 'head', more traditional facilities, including showers and laundry, are a short walk away. If you have a vehicle, we have a parking pass for the lot just outside the dock.
description:
Enjoy our cozy sailboat and enjoy the skyline views. We're moored in a quiet harbor next to Chicago's Museum Campus and Soldier Field late April thru October. Ask about our pre-season booking discount for the 2018 season!

The boat offers a convertible main salon and two berths, a limited galley, and the deck for relaxation and lounging.  The skyline views are fantastic both day and night. The outdoor speakers will broadcast either radio or your device. The Navy Pier fireworks are in view on Wednesday and Saturday nights.

You have access to the whole boat and its adjacent dock. Feel free to store your perishables in the fridge.

In addition to the on-board 'head', more traditional facilities, including showers and laundry, are a short walk away. If you have a vehicle, we have a parking pass for the lot just outside the dock.

We will conduct in-person check ins and go over everything you need to know. 

We're close by so feel free to call if you have any questions.

We are a 10 minute walk to the Field Museum where many cabs are available, a 15-20 minute walk to south Michigan Ave for several CTA bus routes, and another block further to the 'el' trains. There are also 2-3 nearby Divvy stations where bikes are available for rent.

It is a rather high step up to get on/off board and then down into the cabin. If you're lacking agility and can't make the step up or the small jump down then this might not be the right place for your stay. 

Bottled water is provided.
house_rules:
1. No smoking, no exceptions.
2. The head is delicate... Do not put anything in that you haven't eaten plus 4 squares of TP at one time.
3. The stove is not available for use.
4. Please do not entertain more than 10 people, including those in your party.
interaction:

We're close by so feel free to call if you have any questions.

additional_house_rules:
My building requires a simple signed lease form for each Airbnb tenant.  After booking, you will be sent a link to this form which you will be asked to complete, sign and email back to me.  The completed and signed lease form must be returned no less than 7 days prior to your arrival date.

Dear guests, it is important you know that the building is VERY quiet. Please make sure you are ok with taking your shoes off while home, not playing loud music or TV and no parties before considering this property. Very simply, please respect my home and my neighbors. Please read these rules carefully and take them seriously, failure to comply will result in forfeiture of your deposit and/or termination of your reservation without a refund. 

1.) No parties or additional overnight guests without prior approval. Noise disturbances reported by neighbors or police are unacceptable.
2.) Please ensure you have left the premises and returned any keys issued to you by the agreed upon check out time. Failure to do so will result in a $250 late check-out fee. 
3.) No smoking (of anything) inside the unit or on building premises. Additionally, Chicago law prohibits smoking within 15 feet of any building entrance. 
4.) Please be respectful of my neighbors and be mindful of noise and loud music. Please observe quiet hours from 10:00 PM-8:00 AM daily. 
5.) Pets are not allowed at the property.
6.) Lockouts will result in a $150 fee per occurrence.  Additionally, lost keys will incur a $50 per key fee.
7.) We will not rent to vacationing students or individuals under 25 years of age unless accompanied by a parent or adult guardian. Sorry! 
8.)  Please make sure to lock doors behind you at all times.

access: Guests will have private access to the unit. Please be respectful of the other tenants in the building when passing through the common areas. The building does not permit Airbnb guests to hang out in common areas. Furthermore, only one washer is allowed to be used at a time.
description:
*SPECIAL* Jan-Feb Stay 7+ nights at 20% off OR 30+ at 25% off! 

Now hosting long-stays of 7 nights or more! Spot Hero parking behind the building!

Enjoy a classic Chicago neighborhood vacation with this comfortable 2 bedroom apartment. We've got all of your basic amenities and are surrounded by neighborhood dining, shopping, and entertainment! Magnificent mile is only a 10 minute bus ride away!

We designed this second-floor apartment as a bright and cozy retreat for friends and family visiting from the coasts, and we're delighted to make it available to travelers from around the world. 

When writing, please tell us about your visit and who will be traveling with you. Here is what you can expect for your stay: 

• Thoughtful, artistic furnishings blending chic, modern and eclectic design. 
• Crisp linens and plush pillows with comforters in every room:
- MASTER BEDROOM - Queen bed with extensive closet
- GUEST BEDROOM - 2 Twin bunk beds. 
• Full Bathroom with shower/tub combo, plush towels, shampoo, conditioner and body wash, and a hairdryer for your convenience.
• Large, well-equipped kitchen stocked with coffee, tea, spices and cooking essentials. 
• Breakfast bar for eating, working, etc.
• Spacious living room with a TV and a Roku player for streaming your favorite apps.
• High speed wifi.
• Washer and dryer.
• Central heat and air conditioning. 
• Huge windows overlooking a beautiful street in West town!


Within a 5-minute walk, you can: 
* Get on the public transportation (15 minutes to downtown)
* Pick up coffee and fresh-baked scones
* Get everything you need for your trip from the grocery store.
* Have an intimate dinner at a farm to table concept restaurant.
* Browse a used bookstore and boutique
* Play in the park
* Visit the library
* Strike a yoga pose
* Find the perfect dress
* Dine out (Japanese, French, Italian, Thai, Greek, Mexican, Korean, farm-to-table bistro, wine bar and more)
* Indulge at the corner gelato shop
* Hop on a Divvy (city bike share)
* Sample a flight of craft beers at a local brewery
* Raise a pint at the corner pub

Guests will have private access to the unit. Please be respectful of the other tenants in the building when passing through the common areas. The building does not permit Airbnb guests to hang out in common areas. Furthermore, only one washer is allowed to be used at a time.

Please be respectful of the other tenants in the building when passing through the common areas. The building does not permit Airbnb guests to hang out in common areas. Furthermore, only one washer is allowed to be used at a time.

Wicker Park and West Town are just amazing. You'd practically never have to leave walking distance to experience the entire spectrum of Chicago. Though, for the sake of time and adventure, if you venture N,S,E or W...you'll run into plenty of buzzing activities and neighborhoods to explore.

Chicago's elevated train (the “L" or "El") and bus network is expansive and services city neighborhoods and some surrounding suburbs. Ticket prices start at $2.50 per train ride and $2.25 per bus ride. 

• Nearest Train: Chicago Blue Line Stop — 5-minute bus ride.
 
• Nearest Bus (North/South): #50 Damen Bus — 1-minute walk 

• Nearest Bus (East/West): #66 Chicago Bus — 2-minute walk 

• Nearest Metra Station: Ogilvie Transportation Center — 10-minute cab.
Metra travels from downtown Chicago (Ogilvie Transportation Center) to Kenosha, Wisconsin, and stops at Ravinia, a popular outdoor summer concert/picnic venue.

Other transportation options:

• Divvy Bike: Nearest bike station — 2-minute walk
Divvy is Chicago's bike sharing system with 4,760 bikes and 476 stations across the city, available for use 24 hours a day, 365 days a year. Divvy bikes can be rented from and returned to any station in the system. 

• Taxi/Uber: Request a range of different drivers, including taxis, to your location anywhere in the city. Taxi rides to/from O'Hare International Airport run about $35.

No microwave. No cable.

Please be respectful of the other tenants in the building when passing through the common areas. The building does not permit Airbnb guests to hang out in common areas. Furthermore, only one washer is allowed to be used at a time.

Guests can access all location on property this is for rental of the whole house.

description:
Ready for BMW Championship. 2019 gut rehab. Walking distance to Medinah Country Club. 

1800sq ft upstairs includes:
Beds: 1 king, 1 full, 1 baby crib convertible. Baths: 1 full, 1 half. Office. Sectional. TV. 
Open concept kitchen/living room. 9ft quartz island. Farm-style dining table.   

800sq ft finished basement includes:
Baths: 1 full. Sectional. Dry-bar. Laundry. TV. (Basement can sleep guests) 

Sliding glass door from living room creates indoor/outdoor space opening up to patio.

Walking distance to Medinah Country Club.

The whole house is for use. Two sectionals upstairs and downstairs can be used to sleep guests if you would like. 

Baby’s room does have a crib that can be converted into a bed for a small child, otherwise it would not be useable for an adult. Plenty of space for blow-up mattress (not included). 

House completely gut rehabbed in 2019. Everything is brand new. Huge 9ft island in the kitchen that opens to living room. Perfect indoor outdoor for hosting or having fun during the BMW championship. 

Any questions please ask.

Guests can access all location on property this is for rental of the whole house. 

Would prefer, unless the space is used in the baby room, that it be off-limits, but will leave that to renters discretion.

On call if necessary.

Walking distance to Medinah Country Club.  

Easy access to highway to downtown Chicago. 

Neighborhood is quiet. Tree filled Park with tennis courts/large pond only 1/4 mile away. 

Neighbors are friendly.

Close to the highway (5 minutes) for access to downtown Chicago and access to airports. 

Also a 5 minute drive to the Metra which can bring you downtown as well.

Great indoor outdoor space. Lot is approx 1/2 acre. Huge backyard space. 

Nest thermostat. 

King bed in master with TV and picturesque windows. 

Plenty of closet space/dresser space.
house_rules: Small pets only.

Baby’s room does have a crib that can be converted into a bed for a small child, otherwise it would not be useable for an adult. Plenty of space for blow-up mattress (not included). 

House completely gut rehabbed in 2019. Everything is brand new. Huge 9ft island in the kitchen that opens to living room. Perfect indoor outdoor for hosting or having fun during the BMW championship. 

Any questions please ask.
summary:
Ready for BMW Championship. 2019 gut rehab. Walking distance to Medinah Country Club. 

1800sq ft upstairs includes:
Beds: 1 king, 1 full, 1 baby crib convertible. Baths: 1 full, 1 half. Office. Sectional. TV. 
Open concept kitchen/living room. 9ft quartz island. Farm-style dining table.   

800sq ft finished basement includes:
Baths: 1 full. Sectional. Dry-bar. Laundry. TV. (Basement can sleep guests) 

Sliding glass door from living room creates indoor/outdoor space opening up to patio.
transit:
Close to the highway (5 minutes) for access to downtown Chicago and access to airports. 

Also a 5 minute drive to the Metra which can bring you downtown as well.

description:
Pilsen Garden Gem is in an amazing artsy neighborhood. Our neighborhood is full of great coffee shops and great art.

I live upstairs from the property if guest needs anything I will do my best to accommodate.

We have many amazing coffee shops but my favorite is EL Cafecito located at the L Pink Line so you can grab your coffee before heading to explore the city.

Pink Line is located minutes from property and if you rent a car we are also minutes from I-55 and 290.

additional_house_rules:
House Rules:

All bookings require a security deposit of $250 or more. This deposit will not be charged in advance.

 Kindly note that the special reduction in Cleaning Fees is only for the Winter Season (1 dec 2019)hence the regular Cleaning fees of USD 100 will be applicable for all arrivals on or after 01 March, 2019 on wards.  

For security purposes, we require all guests to provide an ID verification, license, or passport before check-in.   Guests can cancel within 24 hours of booking and receive a full refund, or cancel anytime up to seven days before the start of your trip and receive a 50% refund. Trips cancelled fewer than seven days in advance are not eligible for refunds. 

  Check-in time is any time after 4 P.M. Check-out time is any time before 11 a.m. If an earlier check-in or a later check-out time is desired, then you can send us a request. However, this is not guaranteed. We do not allow smoking; breaking this rule will incur a $300 fine.   

No parties, gatherings or events of any kind are allowed in the unit.   

Our locations do not allow pets.

   If a location is left in an exceptionally messy state, we will charge $25 for every extra hour of cleaning required.

   Guests take full responsibility for any accidents, injuries, or illnesses that occur while on the premises or its facilities. By accepting this reservation, it is agreed that all guests are expressly assuming the risk of any harm arising from their use of the premises. Guests recognize that they may personally purchase insurance to protect themselves in such events.   

Lost or unreturned keys at the time of checkout will be charged a $50 per set.  

If more guests sleep at a location than the number originally stated in the booking, the security deposit will be charged in full.   We may ask to hold in advance a damage/security deposit for last minute reservations or local stays. 

 If you notice anything that presents a danger that could result in damage to the location or to any individuals, let us know immediately.  

 If guests delay the cleaners from beginning their cleaning at the predetermined check-out time, guests will be charged $50. This fee is applied to any late checkout between 11 am and 1 pm. Any guest who is still in the location after 1 pm will be charged for an extra night. This does not apply if our team has approved a late checkout in advance.  

 When you make a reservation with us, you are agreeing to all of the above House Rules.  
Shoes off, please.

description:
Treat yourself to a modern getaway in a Stratus Suite at the heart of trendy Pilsen! Enjoy the comforts and privacy of a light, airy apartment near the chicest galleries and gourmet cuisine.

Neighborhood Overview
This apartment is situated perfectly for the traveler looking to experience Chicago’s largest attractions while staying in one of its intimate communities. Pilsen is a cultural hub of flavorful and visual attractions, from The Art Walk and Thalia Hall to its authentic Mexican and Vietnamese restaurants, all of which are still only a short drive away from the Museum District, the Magnificent Mile, and Navy Pier.

Designed with the traveler in mind, this 1 Bedroom Stratus Suite (sleeps 4) caters to all your needs in a spacious layout with a fun mixture of bold and muted styles that reflect the vibrancy of Chicago, all while providing a peaceful space for your stay. 

Stratus suites offer guests the comfort and style of a hotel without all the fuss. Complete with fresh furnishings and smart decor, each room is suited to the trendy traveler who craves comfort in new places. At the primary status level, the Stratus suite is ready to make you feel at home. 

At a Glance

* Custom furnishings 
* Full and spacious kitchen
* Large flatscreen Smart TV
* Fast Internet 
*On the Art Walk
*Concierge services available from 9am to 10pm (central)8

This apartment is situated perfectly for the traveler looking to experience Chicago’s largest attractions while staying in one of its intimate communities. Pilsen is a cultural hub of flavorful and visual attractions, from The Art Walk and Thalia Hall to its authentic Mexican and Vietnamese restaurants, all of which are still only a short drive away from the Museum District, the Magnificent Mile, and Navy Pier.
Please note there is currently neighboring construction, potential for noise between 8am to 6pm.

Paid parking @ USD 25$ per night,please contact us for more information.

description:
The downtown South Loop is a vibrant area featuring eclectic eateries, shops, museums, theaters and parks. Comprised mostly of high-rises, it’s also home to the 108-story Willis Tower. The iconic “Cloud Gate” sculpture sits in Millennium Park. Grant Park features the large, rococo-style Buckingham Fountain and the renowned Art Institute of Chicago, and hosts annual events like The Taste of Chicago and Lollapalooza. Breathtaking view of Lake Michigan can be seen from the apartment also!

Please note: The bathroom for this private bedroom has an unattached bathroom.


This is a two bedroom, two bathroom loft apartment. You'll get a private bedroom. The living room and the kitchen will be shared with other guests. And since it's a loft styled apartment, in addition to the wide-open feel of the apartment, it's also characterized by high ceilings, exposed piping, ventilator tubes, support beams and poles, etc. Please note: One of the bathrooms is not attached/inside of the bedroom, and both bedroom doors can only be locked from inside of the room. And for this listing, you'll get the room that has an unattached bathroom, as the price is lower than the other room.

access: Guests can access the Apartment, back deck, back yard and laundry room. The Apartment is not wheelchair or ADA accessible. There is zoned street parking directly in front of the Apartment. We can provide parking passes for stays of 5 nights or less free of charge, and for a small fee for longer stays.  There is free 24-hour parking one block north of the Apartment on Flournoy.
description:
This 3BR apartment was decorated by travelers with fellow travelers in mind. The space is comfortable & near downtown. You will find plenty to enjoy when you stay here. 3 blocks from the "L" (blue line).

Approx. 1,000 sq. feet (93 sq. meter). Top floor apartment in 1890s Row House. Three small cozy bedrooms with large open communal spaces encourages interaction among guests.

Guests can access the Apartment, back deck, back yard and laundry room. The Apartment is not wheelchair or ADA accessible. There is zoned street parking directly in front of the Apartment. We can provide parking passes for stays of 5 nights or less free of charge, and for a small fee for longer stays.  There is free 24-hour parking one block north of the Apartment on Flournoy.

We love international travel. We will be happy to welcome people from all over the world to stay in our home. Just let us know what interests you and we will be happy to help. We will provide as much interaction with guests as we can, if that is what you desire.

This property is located in Chicago's Near West Side Community Area in the Tri-Taylor neighborhood. Tri-Taylor is an extension of the Little Italy neighborhood directly to its east. It is one of the most diverse neighborhoods in Chicago. It is largely a residential area for students from the University of Illinois at Chicago and students and employees from the nearby Illinois Medical District.

This property is very convenient to public transportation. The CTA Blue Line is 3 blocks to the northwest and offers access to the Loop within 10 minutes. The apartment is also right near the Western and Harrison Avenue CTA bus lines. The Eisenhower Expressway is also only a few blocks away, which offers easy access to the Loop and the entire Chicagoland area.

additional_house_rules:
- You agree to the following:
- 
- CHECK-IN: is on or after 5 PM unless otherwise agreed to in writing as our cleaning staff needs sufficient time to prepare. Arriving onsite earlier without approval is trespassing 
- KEYS: to return any access keys and remotes with a $50 replacement fee for every lost key and $250 for any remote or entry FOB
- BUILDING STAFF/NEIGHBORS: you understand that building staff DO NOT work for us and will not assist you. Do not bother them. We typically host guests staying 30+ nights who tend to be familiar with the premises. If you happen to be an exception, do not share reservation details or engage in any activity that will disturb the tranquility of this residential community. Contact me or my team for ALL questions or directions. We pick-up phones until midnight and are eager to help you 
- QUIET HOURS/DISTURBANCE: between 9 PM and 9 AM. No parties, drug use, or gatherings of any kind. Any additional occupants in excess of the # on your reservation must be approved by me whether in your unit or in common areas. Any damage from you or your guests will result in immediate expulsion, at an additional cost to you, a claim with Airbnb and subsequent legal action 
- SMOKING: whether inside your unit, in a common area or roof deck, no smoking of any substance is allowed. Smoke damage to a unit will result in a $1000 fee
- PETS: you understand pets are not allowed in your unit. Pet damage may result in additional fees
- MISSING ITEMS: will be charged to you in a claim 
- ID CHECK: per the rules of this community, we'll request you submit your Government Issued Photo ID at the time of your e-check in via our site. You'll have to also agree to our terms of service. We're required to do a public records check for certain communities
- BREACH: any violation of the above shall result in immediate removal from the property at an additional cost to you
- BOOKING WITHIN 24 HRS: We'll send a request for a $500-1000 deposit which shall be fully returned on checkout

description:
Gorgeous 2BD/2BA Unit in the heart of Chicago - Rivernorth. Professionally managed and cleaned with stylish kitchen, free high-speed wifi and 24/7 support. Fully stocked with all the convenience you would expect at a hotel.

We are available to assist you with absolutely anything you need through midnight, 7 days a week

Cozy and modern apartment units situated along Chicago's River North District. A few minutes away from the Chicago Riverwalk, the Puerto Convention Center and the Shedd Aquarium, along with hundreds of art galleries and local museums. The brown and the purple lines are the main mode of transportation in the city. Amenities include a 24Hr fitness center, a business center with wifi hot spots, hospitable accommodation and a rooftop swimming pool. All units include a modern kitchen, floor to ceiling windows, in-unit washer/dryers and flat screen TV's. Free fast wifi, kitchen/cookware and bathroom amenities are also provided. For any concerns, our amazing customer support team is available to assist.

We offer rewards and complimentary upgrades to our regular repeat guests

description:
A small and cozy room in a lower level of a house. The space has a full bathroom and a spacious living room. The room has a twin-sized rolling bed, a chair, and a small table. 

I live upstairs with my family.

There is no kitchen but there is a microwave and a fridge. 
There is AC but the controller is upstairs.

A very friendly neighborhood. The Metra is about 10 mins away driving and it goes to Chicago downtown. It is only a 30 min drive to downtown Chicago depending on traffic.
Free parking.

We are close to many cool places.
We are only 4 miles away from Tinley Park Convention Center.
We are only 1 mile away from the Oak Forest Metra Train station.
We are within a couple miles of many stores such as Walmart, Marcus theatres, Mcdonalds, Dunkin Donuts, Jewel, Food for less, and many others.

Washer, dryer, microwave, fridge, WIFI, and all of the lower level of the house.
The room is very small and has no windows or vents but it is comfortable. Most of the guests who stayed in this room extended their stay :).

I am always available for questions. We are a very welcoming Egyptian family. If you stay long enough, you might get to try some Egyptian food :)

The washer and dryer are on the lower level so we come down occasionally to use them but we will be sure to let you know beforehand.

The neighborhood is safe. There is a walking trail less than 10 mins away walking. There is a lake on Cicero avenue that is about 20 minutes away walking.

Parking is free.
The train that goes to downtown Chicago is about 10 mins away driving.
There are buses' close by but you would have to check the bus routes/schedules for more details.

The bathroom isn't fully updated but it is fully functional.
The house is slightly old therefore the floors squeak when we walk on them upstairs.
There is another airbnb room in the lower level that would be using the same bathroom and living room.

• Check-in is available after 4 pm. You will pick up your keys from the onsite guest service team upon arrival.

If you’re planning to arrive after 10pm, please call the reception at 1-847-657-0002 so that you’re not marked as a no-show in their system.

No shows on the day of arrival: If you do not check-in on your specified arrival date, and we have not received written notice of your late arrival or cancellation, then you will be marked as a no-show and your reservation will be cancelled (please note that the standard cancellation policy will apply).
• Check-out time is before 11 am. Please return your keys to the onsite guest services team.
• There is a light cleaning service provided every few days.
• Guests must be a minimum age of 21 years in order to make a reservation, and must occupy the unit for the duration of the stay. You will be asked to provide photo identification upon check-in. Any reservation made under false pretenses will forfeit all payments, and guests will be escorted from the property.

description:
Whether you're in Chicago for business or leisure, our studio is the perfect place for you to stay. It has many amenities you're sure to love, including:

• Studio with 1 Queen bed
• On-site self-serve laundry facilities and in-house dry-cleaning service
• Air-conditioned living space
• Cable television and DVD player
• FREE standard Wi-Fi
• Fully-equipped kitchen
• Complimentary breakfast buffet with delicious options
• 24 hour business center and 24 hour fitness center
• Heated indoor pool
• On-site guest service team

Enjoy a stay in "The Glen" business district courtesy of a stay in our studio. Business travelers will love being close to a variety of major businesses, including Allstate Insurance, Anixter, Kraft, and Mead Johnson. Northwestern University is also close by. There is a Metra Station within walking distance which provides guests easy access to downtown Chicago.

Our STUDIO has 1 Queen bed. Retreat to our air-conditioned space and curl up and enjoy your favorite shows on our flatscreen TV or watch your favorite movie with our DVD player. In-room movies are available on premium cable. You can easily connect with friends and family back home, courtesy of the complimentary Wi-Fi. Get some work done while you're away by taking advantage of the laptop-friendly space.

Get ready in our 1 BATHROOM. We provide you with a hairdryer, towels, and complimentary toiletries. There are self-serve washing and drying machines available on-site. Same-day dry cleaning services are available.

In the KITCHEN you'll find a stove, a microwave, a dishwasher, a refrigerator, cooking utensils, and dishes. You can enjoy all of your meals in the dining area. Start your morning with a cup of coffee, fresh from our in-suite coffee machine. In the morning, enjoy a complimentary breakfast buffet that features a variety of delicious options.

There are a number of other amenities you're sure to enjoy when you stay at Staybridge Chicago Glenview where our space is conveniently located. These include the business center, which is open 24-hours and has office supplies, printers, scanners, and business services. The fitness center is also open 24-hours and has 2 motorized treadmills, an elliptical machine, a stationary bike, and a 5 station multi-gym unit along with a small selection of free weights.

After working out, be sure to take advantage of the heated indoor pool, which is open from 8am to 10pm. Between Monday and Wednesday there is an evening reception for guests with food, drink, and more. Guest services are available on-site to ensure a stress-free stay.

If you're traveling by car, there is free parking available on-site.

A number of these units are available, and each is individually decorated. The images shown are a representation of the unit you will receive. At check-in, you will receive a unit of the same type as shown in this listing, complete with the advertised size and number of rooms, but the actual decor in the unit, view, and furniture layout may differ. You will have access to all amenities advertised!

A damage deposit will be processed as a pre-authorization on your credit card and will be released after your departure provided there is no damage, items missing, or extra cleaning required.

LOCAL FAVORITES

As our guest, you’ll enjoy easy access to excellent nightlife. Travel to downtown Chicago and experience the bustling bar scene or dine at one of the many gourmet restaurants. Glenview is home to the Kohl Children’s Museum, which has 17 different exhibits dedicated to instilling a love for learning in young children. The Illinois Holocaust Museum is only five miles away and features a myriad of powerful exhibits.

• FREE standard Wi-Fi
• Complimentary breakfast buffet to start your day
• The heated indoor pool is open from 8am to 10pm
• If you're traveling by car, there is free parking available on-site
• A number of these units are available, and each is individually decorated. The images shown are a representation of the unit you will receive. At check-in, you will receive a unit of the same type as shown in this listing, complete with the advertised size and number of rooms, but the actual decor in the unit, view, and furniture layout may differ. You will have access to all amenities advertised!
• A damage deposit will be processed as a pre-authorization on your credit card and will be released after your departure provided there is no damage, items missing, or extra cleaning required.
• A light housekeeping service is provided from Monday to Friday and a full cleaning is provided every 7 days

access: Entire house, front porch, back patio, 2-4 parking spaces in back patio area (depending on size of your cars and your ability to navigate Chicago alleys :)
description:
Our home  is spacious and sunny, with modern bathrooms and kitchen.  We live here year-round, but decided to rent it out if we are out of town because we love AirBnb and can use the help with our mortgage! We are both Chicago Public School Teachers and we bought this-our first home- in 2017.   Please check out our 2BR listing  to see our reviews as hosts.
https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/18826618?s=51
We look forward to sharing this special place with you!

Enjoy Chicago and Logan Square in this cozy and sunny cottage! We are teachers with a dog and a toddler daughter and we rent our home while we are away on vacation!

There are four official bedrooms,  two downstairs and two upstairs.

The downstairs rooms sleep 4, one room has a twin sized bed and the other has twin over full bunk beds that sleep 3.

Upstairs is our bedroom  (queen sized bed), and our daughter's room with a crib and floor space for a full-sized air mattress if needed. Our upstairs library/den also has a full sized memory foam topped futon that sleeps 2!

You have two full bathrooms (one on each floor), and a modern kitchen stocked with everything you'll need.

Entire house, front porch, back patio, 2-4 parking spaces in back patio area (depending on size of your cars and your ability to navigate Chicago alleys :)

If you are renting our whole house we will  mostly likely be out of town, but we are always available via phone or text to help with anything you need!

Parks and trees!
Great restaurants and bars.
Easy access to all of Chicago!

The Blue Line stop at Logan Sq is a 20 minute (1 mile) walk. 
O'Hare via Blue Line - 25 minutes
Downtown via Blue Line - 15 minutes on the el, (approximately 35 minutes door to door if you walk to the El Stop from our apartment, wait 5 minutes for a train, etc).
Many bus routes are nearby (within two blocks).
We are 3 blocks away from a Divvy bike share station, which is great if you like to bike and want to explore the city when the weather is nice ($7/day per bike)! The house comes with 4 secured parking spots. Additionally, on street parking does not require a permit, is ample, and easy to find.

Tons of bars and restaurants in walking distance! There's a welcome binder with our reviews upon arrival!

The Blue Line stop at Logan Sq is a 20 minute (1 mile) walk. We are two blocks from a bus stop with frequent buses (every 12 minutes or so) to take you directly to the el if you prefer not to walk.
O'Hare via Blue Line - 25 minutes
Downtown via Blue Line - 15 minutes on the el, (approximately 35 minutes door to door if you walk to the El Stop from our apartment, wait 5 minutes for a train, etc).

We are 3 blocks away from a Divvy bike share station, which is great if you like to bike and want to explore the city when the weather is nice ($7/day per bike)! The house comes with 4 secured parking spots. Additionally, on street parking does not require a permit; it is ample and easy to find.

Additional bus routes (Fullerton, Armitage, Kimball, Pulaski) are all within 4 blocks.
house_rules: House broken dogs only, please. No other animals please.

description:
Come relax in this stylish 2BR/2BA, professionally managed by Kasa. In the middle of all Chicago has to offer - near large companies and a short distance to Grant Park and delicious local restaurants, bars, and shopping. Less than 2mi to McCormick Place. 
Key features include: 
*Relax in the luxurious king-sized bed 
*Cook and enjoy wonderful cuisine with the modern high-end kitchen 
*Browse the web and stream HD video with ultra high-speed internet 
*Work out in the upscale fitness center

House Rules: 
We created Kasa to be your home on the road.  We’re committed to being great neighbors and strictly enforce these House Rules to ensure the comfort and safety of our community. NO Smoking - Smoking of any kind (including tobacco, marijuana, e-cigarettes, vape pens, and hookahs) is never allowed at this property. This applies to the entire apartment (including the balcony or patio), as well as all common and outdoor areas of the building. Kasa apartments may be monitored with marijuana and tobacco sensors. Noise - At all times, Kasa guests may not disturb their neighbors’ quiet enjoyment. In addition, guests must observe quiet hours from 9:00 p.m. to 8:00 a.m.  Parties and large gatherings are prohibited.  Kasa apartments are proactively monitored with decibel sensors for compliance with this noise policy.   Occupancy – Each Kasa has a maximum occupancy limit. There can be no more than the specified number of guests on the premises at any given time. Large gatherings are not permitted.  Lost and Found - Kasa assumes no liability for lost, misplaced, stolen, or damaged belongings, including any belongings which are left in the unit after your departure time has passed.  Pets –With the exception of service animals, breed and pet restrictions are imposed by the building management. Requests to bring a pet must be approved by Kasa prior to booking. $15 Daily pet fee per day will apply. Pet fees are not included in the total reservation price. If you are authorized to bring a pet, an additional pet fee will be applied after the booking is complete. Kasa has a 1 pet per apartment limit.  Return of Fobs & Keys – All designated fobs, keys, and parking passes must be left in the apartment upon check out.  Failure to do so will result in an immediate replacement fee of up to $250.00 per item. Please alert Kasa staff immediately if any items are missing at the beginning of your stay.   Infestation - If Kasa determines that you have brought any infestation into the unit or onto the premises, Kasa reserves the right to charge you for any and all costs and expenses that Kasa deems necessary to address the infestation.  Parking at Own Risk - All vehicles parked on the premises must be registered with Kasa prior to arrival. Vehicles are parked at the risk of the owner. Kasa shall not assume liability or responsibility for any vehicle, occupants, or contents while operated or parked on the property.  Damaged or Missing Property - Guests are liable for any damage and/or theft at the unit, premises, or property caused by the guest, their visitors, or other persons present in the unit during the guest’s stay. This includes damage to rooms, fixtures, furnishings and equipment (such as towels, artwork, electronics, and kitchen equipment). Kasa reserves the right to charge guests for 120% of such amounts as it shall in its sole discretion deem necessary to compensate or make good the costs or expenses incurred or suffered by Kasa as a result of the damage and/or theft. Charges may include but are not limited to: all property damage; missing or damaged items; smoking fee; cleaning fee; and guest compensation.  Identity Verification - To protect against identity theft and fraud, and for the safety of other guests and neighbors in the community, you will be required to provide a scanned or photographed copy of your valid, government-issued photo ID during the virtual check-in process for the purpose of performing a background check or screening.  Use - The unit and amenity areas shall not be used for any unlawful or illegal purpose. No nails, screws, or other items may be driven into any portion of the unit. Guests shall use the unit for residential purposes only. Guests shall not conduct any commercial, industrial, or retail activity in the unit.  Client Accommodation Agreement - Prior to arrival, all guests must agree to abide by the Kasa Stay Rules, which will be provided to the guest for review and signature during the virtual check-in process. Security Deposit – Non-compliance with the House Rules and Kasa Stay Rules could result in a penalty and/or forfeiture of the Security Deposit and/or eviction without a refund.

access: Self- check-in directions will be provided prior to arrival.
description:
Beautiful room in a two bed shared. Option to reserve the whole condo if needed. Beautiful rooftop views of downtown Chicago skyline. 5 minute walk to McCormick Place.

Self- check-in directions will be provided prior to arrival.

Your host willbe provided for you 24/7 in case yu have any issues. But the self check-in directions are easy and hassle-free.

Beautiful south loop neighborhood. 5 minute walk to McCormick Place, WinTrust Arena. As well as a 3 minute Uber ride to Grant/Millenium Park.  The neighborhood has many restaurants and places to hang out without all the rumbling of being in the heart of downtown.

The condo is accessible by all the major highways, I-90/94, I-55, I- 290, as well as public transportation straight shot to both Midway and O'hare airport. There are also public buses that get you to the heart of downtown within 5-7 minutes.
house_rules: No smoking allowed. However there is a patio in case you can't resist. Please treat house as if it were your own. Respect reasonable quiet time in case there are other guests occupying the unit in the other room.
