access:
Entire Apartment
All Amenities
Downtown Chicago at your Doorstep!
description:
Luxury studio apartment in River North. Enjoy stunning views of the city from the balcony before walking to work from this conveniently located apartment. In your free time enjoy Michigan Avenue for shopping, as well as museums, restaurants and nightlife at your doorstep. Taxi and bus located at the doorstep, the train is just 4 blocks away.

Modern. Clean. All-Inclusive.  Enjoy stunning city from floor to ceiling windows while having the luxury of premiere shopping, dining, and big city attractions at your doorstep. This spacious apartment includes quartz countertops and peninsula counter seating with dimmable pendant lighting, King Bed, glass backsplash, sleek stainless steel appliances, rich grey oak flooring, generous walk through closets, in-unit washer and dryer and controlled heating/air all year.

This 24-hour doorman building features a 24/7 business center with a private conference room, attached parking, package receiving, recreation room with billiards, indoor whirlpool spa, sauna, steam room, chroma light therapy showers, room service with PearChef, deluxe media theater, outdoor pool and sundeck, fitness center with cardio, weights and yoga studio, fire pit, grills, full outdoor kitchen and a social-friendly club room with a chef inspired kitchen. 

Arrive with just your suitcase and we handle everything else for you.  Your automated monthly payment includes all furnishings, linens, kitchen and household items, high speed wireless Internet, unlimited calling nationwide, all utilities, cable TV with flat screen TV/s, access to all amenities, 24-hour maintenance and 24-hour customer service.   We offer month to month contracts with a 31 night minimum and a 14 day notice to vacate.  Parking and maid service are available, and apartment prices depend on your dates of stay.  Book today to start your Chicago experience!

All Amenities
Downtown Chicago at your Doorstep!

24-Hour Maintenance 
24-Hour Customer Support

With our location’s convenient access to W Grand Avenue and W Kinzie St, you can get to the hottest Chicago landmarks in minutes. Stroll and shop at Magnificent Mile or hit Merchandise Mart for interior design inspiration. Discover the picturesque views of Chicago River or head over to East Bank Club.

Easy bus, train and taxi access. Close to highway.
Walk to Everything!

description:
Bright and sunny private large bedroom Located within two blocks of the University of Chicago, beautiful neighborhood with many parks, shopping, museums, bookstores, and cafés. Easy access to public transportation, 15 minutes to downtown.  Women only please, due to the configuration of my bathroom. I have had pleasure of hosting women from all around the world . There is a desk, Wi-Fi, access to a washer and dryer and a lovely kitchen.  Welcome to my home !

Beautiful neighborhood, close to the lake, many parks, good shopping and wonderful public transportation

access: I’ll give you a code to the front door and entry instructions upon booking.
description:
Safe, sunny, close to the city,  comfortable apartment, Pilsen, the loveliest of neighborhoods,  just off Damen, steps to the bus, train, divvy bikes and free street parking. 10 minutes to the West Loop (shopping, food), 15 minutes by any transportation method to downtown (Sears Tower, Chicago Theater, Art Institute, the Bean, Millennium Park, Grant Park), Wicker Park (shopping, bars, restaurants), South Loop (Field Museum, Planetarium, Soldier Field, McCormick Place)

I have a washer and dryer, feel free to use my supplies if you need, also feel free to replace anything if you use a lot. 

I have an ironing board, hair dryer, place for your toiletries, clean towels for you. 

Use the fridge and cupboards to store your groceries. 

There is a locking locker in your bedroom for valuables.

I’ll give you a code to the front door and entry instructions upon booking.

I try to be around for check in if possible and certainly I am available for questions and conversation, however nothing overtly formal or overbearing. This should all be easy.

The apartment is directly next to the Damen Pink Line CTA train stop making it very easy to get to and from the city and airports. 

There is a cool neighborhood dive bar across the street and within walking distance there are plenty more cool Pilsen bars and restaurants with cheap beer, great cocktails, Michelin star food, live music, and eclectic local down to earth Chicago people. 

Grocery and pharmacy are within walking distance. 

5 minute walk to the Mexican Museum of Art.

Interstate 55 is five minutes away, interstate 290 is 5 minutes away, Pink Line Damen stop steps away, #50 Damen bus stop steps away, Divvy bike station steps away, I also have bikes you can borrow if you’re comfortable and if I’m not using them for tours. Parking is free on the street, if you prefer off street parking I have spaces available, simply let me know and I’ll go over the details.

This apartment is perfect for the solo traveler who wants a chill and comfortable place to keep as a home base to explore the city or to retreat home to after a day of sightseeing or meetings. 

It is also quite suitable for two people if those people are comfortable sleeping in the same bed.

additional_house_rules: All bookings require a security deposit of $250 or more. This deposit will not be charged in advance.  Kindly note that the special reduction in Cleaning Fees is only for the Winter Season hence the regular Cleaning fees of USD 100 will be applicable for all arrivals on or after 01 March, 2019 on wards.  For security purposes, we require all guests to provide an ID verification, license, or passport before check-in.   Guests can cancel within 24 hours of booking and receive a full refund, or cancel anytime up to seven days before the start of your trip and receive a 50% refund. Trips cancelled fewer than seven days in advance are not eligible for refunds.   Check-in time is any time after 4 P.M. Check-out time is any time before 11 a.m. If an earlier check-in or a later check-out time is desired, then you can send us a request. However, this is not guaranteed. We do not allow smoking; breaking this rule will incur a $300 fine.   Our locations do not allow pets.   No parties, gatherings or events of any kind are allowed in the unit.   If a location is left in an exceptionally messy state, we will charge $25 for every extra hour of cleaning required.   Guests take full responsibility for any accidents, injuries, or illnesses that occur while on the premises or its facilities. By accepting this reservation, it is agreed that all guests are expressly assuming the risk of any harm arising from their use of the premises. Guests recognize that they may personally purchase insurance to protect themselves in such events.   Lost or unreturned keys at the time of checkout will be charged a $50 per set.  If more guests sleep at a location than the number originally stated in the booking, the security deposit will be charged in full.   We may ask to hold in advance a damage/security deposit for last minute reservations or local stays.  If you notice anything that presents a danger that could result in damage to the location or to any individuals, let us know immediately.   If guests delay the cleaners from beginning their cleaning at the predetermined check-out time, guests will be charged $50. This fee is applied to any late checkout between 11 am and 1 pm. Any guest who is still in the location after 1 pm will be charged for an extra night. This does not apply if our team has approved a late checkout in advance.   When you make a reservation with us, you are agreeing to all of the above House Rules.  Shoes off, please.

access: The entire apartment is for your private use.
description:
Treat yourself to a modern getaway in a Stratus Suite at the heart of trendy Pilsen! Enjoy the comforts and privacy of a light, airy apartment near the chicest galleries and gourmet cuisine.
Please note there is currently neighboring construction, potential for noise between 8am to 6pm.

Designed with the traveler in mind, this 2 Bedroom Stratus Suite (sleeps 6) caters to all your needs in a spacious layout with fun contrasting colors that give Brillo a lively atmosphere - a perfect match for the trendy area! 

Stratus suites offer guests the comfort and style of a hotel without all the fuss. Complete with fresh furnishings and smart decor, each room is suited to the trendy traveler who craves comfort in new places. At the primary status level, the Stratus suite is ready to make you feel at home. ** Please note the second bedroom is an additional space made private by a room divider and does not have an individual door

At a Glance

* Custom furnishings 
* Full and spacious kitchen
* Large flatscreen Smart TV
* Fast Internet 
*On the Art Walk
*Concierge services available from 9am to 10pm (central)

The entire apartment is for your private use.

This apartment is situated perfectly for the traveler looking to experience Chicago’s largest attractions while staying in one of its intimate communities. Pilsen is a cultural hub of flavorful and visual attractions, from The Art Walk and Thalia Hall to its authentic Mexican and Vietnamese restaurants, all of which are still only a short drive away from the Museum District, the Magnificent Mile, and Navy Pier.

Reserved parking available for an additional fee.

access: Guest enter through the side door and walk downstairs to the common area, before reaching the suite.
description:
A cozy garden unit with its separate entrance so you can come as go as you like. The apartment is completely private and it is intended to be your home during your stay.

Note: for anyone over 6ft there is ductwork that runs between the living room and the kitchen area( I’m 6ft and it’s not a problem) please consider this when booking.

Guest enter through the side door and walk downstairs to the common area, before reaching the suite.

My family and I live on the second floor, so I am on-site. I can always we reached by calls or text.

Free street parking is available as well as permit parking( 1day parking permits will by available on the desk)

The orange line is a 10 minute walk (4blocks) and will get you downtown in 20-25 minutes.

ChinaTown is a 15 minute ride also on the orange line. 

One way fare is $3 with one transfer to CTA bus or train within 2hours of purchasing fare. You can pay  cash or card.

EASY check-in with our lock box.

There is a permanent tenant in the apartment above you and may hear them walking upstairs. This may be an issue if your a very light sleeper.

Security cameras are placed outside the home for everyone’s safety. 

The guests will have full control of the temperature. Air conditioning by a portable air conditioner. 

Being a garden unit, the floors can get a bit chilly in the winter. We suggest bringing a pair of slippers if traveling in colder months. 

We love children and welcome yours, but we do not provided a crib however a playpen is available. Also the apartment is not baby proofed. There is potential for some furniture to tip if climbed on. We do provided children’s cups, plates, flatware and a Linen for playpen.

An inflatable bed will be provided with the stay of a 4th guest.

Clean and freshly washed Comforters,linens, and towels are always provided. Towels are usually one per person per stay( but feel free to ask if you need an extra) , exceptions for extended stays. 

There is a coin operated washer and dryer in the common area. The total cost for the use of the washer and dryer is $1.75 per load-only takes quarters. Detergent and fabric softener can be purchased at a nearby Dollar tree or Save-a lot. 

The common area/ washer-dryer)is shared with permanent tenant on the first floor.( laundry hours 10am-10pm) 


*** See Rules section below***

All cookware and dishes are available for guest usage, but please wash used cookware and dishes. 

No smoking anywhere in the home. $200 cleaning fee. 

Quiet time is 10:30-8am  on the weekdays and 11:30pm -9am on the weekends.

additional_house_rules:
- Due to local laws or HOA requirements, guests must be at least 25 years of age to book. Guests under 25 must be accompanied by a parent or legal guardian for the duration of the reservation.
- No dog(s) are welcome in this home. No other animals are allowed without specific Vacasa approval.
- The property shall not be used by more than the number of adults and children listed in your reservation.
- All guests shall abide by Vacasa’s good neighbor policy and shall not engage in illegal activity. Quiet hours are from 10 p.m. to 8 a.m.
- If early check-in is available for your reservation, you will be notified by 9am on the morning of your arrival by email. Late check-out is offered whenever possible for a small fee.
- No smoking of any kind is permitted anywhere on the premises.
- No commercial photography or filming is permitted on the property. Tents or other structures may not be erected.
- Renter is liable for any damage to the property and agrees to accept charges to the card on file should damage occur during occupancy.
- Due to local laws, regulations, or Homeowner Association rules, guests may be required to agree to additional terms of service. 
- Property Specific terms: ADDITIONAL RENTAL TERMS FOR THE GRAND PLAZA BUILDING
1. Minimum Age.  You certify that you are at least 25 years of age. You agree to be legally responsible for the compliance of all occupants of the Condo with these Grand Plaza Additional Terms, and that anyone younger than 25 is accompanied by a parent or guardian. You agree that you intend to personally occupy the Condo for the full duration of the period for which you have rented this Condo.
2. Maximum Occupancy. You agree that at no time during the period you have rented the home will daytime or overnight occupancy exceed the posted maximum occupancy of 6 persons. Only the guests listed below are authorized to be in the home during the rental period.  Failure to conform to the occupancy requirements of the Vacation Home is a violation of the Code.
3. Noise and Disruptive Activity.  You agree to conduct yourselves in a manner that is respectful of neighbors by, among other things, refraining from making unduly loud or unnecessary outdoor noises, engaging disorderly conduct or any other activity that could interfere with the quiet enjoyment of neighbors or the community. Quiet Hours are enforced between 10pm ad 8am.
4. Specific breeds are not allowed on the property (Dog Friendly Units): Rottweiler, Doberman, German Shepherd, Pit Bull, American Bulldog, American Staffordshire Terrier, Bull Terrier, Chow, Wolf Breeds, or any mix of the aforementioned breeds, and any breed that relates to security or guard dogs. Sub-breeds of the above mentioned breeds are also not allowed on the property. Any other dog may not be allowed at Management???s sole discretion.
5.  List of Guests. The first and last names and ages of each guest are as follows:
________________________________________________________________________________________________
________________________________________________________________________________________________
________________________________________________________________________________________________
________________________________________________________________________________________________
________________________________________________________________________________________________
________________________________________________________________________________________________
________________________________________________________________________________________________
 Accepted by:   ______________________________________________
Signature of Renter/Responsible Party
______________________________________________
Name of Renter/Responsible Party
______________________________________________
Date of Birth of Renter/Responsible Party
Date: ___________________________________
DAMAGE WAIVER
The total cost of your reservation for this Property includes a damage waiver fee (USD) with the following costs, plus tax if applicable:
0-1 bedrooms: $5 per night
2 bedrooms: $7 per night
3 bedrooms: $10 per night
4 bedrooms: $13 per night
5 or more bedrooms: $16 per night
A discount may be applied for stays of 28 nights or longer if permitted.
The Damage Waiver covers you for up to $2,000 of accidental damage to the Property or its contents (such as furniture, fixtures, and appliances) as long as you report the incident to Vacasa prior to checking out. The Damage Waiver fee eliminates the need for a traditional security deposit.
How to Report Damage
Please report accidental damage as soon as it occurs so we can assess and minimize the extent of the damages. To report accidental damage, please call the Vacasa Guest Services claim line at (888) 529-8858.
Damage Waiver Additional Terms and Conditions
The Damage Waiver only covers damage that occurs during the authorized rental period and that Renter or an authorized guest reports PRIOR TO CHECK OUT.
The Damage Waiver does not cover intentional damage or damage caused by smoking, pets or other animals brought onto the Property, or criminal activity.
The Damage Waiver does not cover damage to any structure other than the Property covered by your confirmed, non-fraudulent reservation.
Renter is responsible for any accidental damage that exceeds $2,000. Damages for covered claims in excess of $2,000 or for uncovered claims will be charged to the Renter?s credit card.
The Damage Waiver program is provided and administered by Vacasa and is not an insurance policy. The Damage Waiver does not provide liability coverage and does not cover vehicles or guest personal items.  
This property is managed by Vacasa LLC.

description:
This property is a 1210  square feet,  2 Bedroom, 2 bathroom accommodation located in Chicago.  Lakeview suite with private balcony, shared pool, sauna, fitness center, & more! offers 1 Sofa bed, 1 King bed, 1 Queen bed. It can host 6 people.  This accommodation features washer/dryer. Please see the description below or inquire for more details!

Reserve your spot at this downtown retreat, and you're in for the full Chicago experience. The city and lake views from your private balcony will take your breath away, and the suite's amenities will make your stay feel like home. Plus, you'll have access to the building's pool, sauna, fitness center, and so much more!

Your neighborhood is packed with great dining - there's no shortage of restaurant options, so take your time exploring the area. Take a walk down by the lake just a few blocks away, or go see a comedy show - wherever you choose to go, the bus route by your building can take you there, if it's not within walking distance.

Head up to the building's 40th floor for amazing amenities like a sundeck with grills and seating, library, basketball court, business center, game room with a pool table, and more. Back at your rental, you'll find two cable TVs, a DVD player, and free WiFi for all your entertainment needs. Your suite is equipped with a full kitchen, as well as a private washer and dryer. Central air conditioning keeps everybody cool here.

Book this amazing city retreat today!

* Please be aware that all guests must be at least 25 years of age unless accompanied by parent or legal guardian.

*Outdoor pool open Memorial Day-Labor Day (Weather Permitting)

**PARKING IS NOT INCLUDED IN THE COST OF YOUR STAY** 
There is a parking garage on the bottom floor of this building, but guests are responsible for the cost. Guests bringing vehicles will need to purchase parking passes from LAZ Parking.

City of Chicago License #2209850

- Due to local laws, regulations, or Homeowner Association rules, guests may be required to agree to additional terms of service. 
- Property Specific terms: ADDITIONAL RENTAL TERMS FOR THE GRAND PLAZA BUILDING
1. Minimum Age.  You certify that you are at least 25 years of age. You agree to be legally responsible for the compliance of all occupants of the Condo with these Grand Plaza Additional Terms, and that anyone younger than 25 is accompanied by a parent or guardian. You agree that you intend to personally occupy the Condo for the full duration of the period for which you have rented this Condo.
2. Maximum Occupancy. You agree that at no time during the period you have rented the home will daytime or overnight occupancy exceed the posted maximum occupancy of 6 persons. Only the guests listed below are authorized to be in the home during the rental period.  Failure to conform to the occupancy requirements of the Vacation Home is a violation of the Code.
3. Noise and Disruptive Activity.  You agree to conduct yourselves in a manner that is respectful of neighbors by, among other things, refraining from making unduly loud or unnecessary outdoor noises, engaging disorderly conduct or any other activity that could interfere with the quiet enjoyment of neighbors or the community. Quiet Hours are enforced between 10pm ad 8am.
4. Specific breeds are not allowed on the property (Dog Friendly Units): Rottweiler, Doberman, German Shepherd, Pit Bull, American Bulldog, American Staffordshire Terrier, Bull Terrier, Chow, Wolf Breeds, or any mix of the aforementioned breeds, and any breed that relates to security or guard dogs. Sub-breeds of the above mentioned breeds are also not allowed on the property. Any other dog may not be allowed at Management???s sole discretion.
5.  List of Guests. The first and last names and ages of each guest are as follows:
________________________________________________________________________________________________
________________________________________________________________________________________________
________________________________________________________________________________________________
________________________________________________________________________________________________
________________________________________________________________________________________________
________________________________________________________________________________________________
________________________________________________________________________________________________
 Accepted by:   ______________________________________________
Signature of Renter/Responsible Party
______________________________________________
Name of Renter/Responsible Party
______________________________________________
Date of Birth of Renter/Responsible Party
Date: ___________________________________
DAMAGE WAIVER
The total cost of your reservation for this Property includes a damage waiver fee (USD) with the following costs, plus tax if applicable:
0-1 bedrooms: $5 per night
2 bedrooms: $7 per night
3 bedrooms: $10 per night
4 bedrooms: $13 per night
5 or more bedrooms: $16 per night
A discount may be applied for stays of 28 nights or longer if permitted.
The Damage Waiver covers you for up to $2,000 of accidental damage to the Property or its contents (such as furniture, fixtures, and appliances) as long as you report the incident to Vacasa prior to checking out. The Damage Waiver fee eliminates the need for a traditional security deposit.
How to Report Damage
Please report accidental damage as soon as it occurs so we can assess and minimize the extent of the damages. To report accidental damage, please call the Vacasa Guest Services claim line at (888) 529-8858.
Damage Waiver Additional Terms and Conditions
The Damage Waiver only covers damage that occurs during the authorized rental period and that Renter or an authorized guest reports PRIOR TO CHECK OUT.
The Damage Waiver does not cover intentional damage or damage caused by smoking, pets or other animals brought onto the Property, or criminal activity.
The Damage Waiver does not cover damage to any structure other than the Property covered by your confirmed, non-fraudulent reservation.
Renter is responsible for any accidental damage that exceeds $2,000. Damages for covered claims in excess of $2,000 or for uncovered claims will be charged to the Renter?s credit card.
The Damage Waiver program is provided and administered by Vacasa and is not an insurance policy. The Damage Waiver does not provide liability coverage and does not cover vehicles or guest personal items.  
This property is managed by Vacasa LLC.
space:
Reserve your spot at this downtown retreat, and you're in for the full Chicago experience. The city and lake views from your private balcony will take your breath away, and the suite's amenities will make your stay feel like home. Plus, you'll have access to the building's pool, sauna, fitness center, and so much more!

Your neighborhood is packed with great dining - there's no shortage of restaurant options, so take your time exploring the area. Take a walk down by the lake just a few blocks away, or go see a comedy show - wherever you choose to go, the bus route by your building can take you there, if it's not within walking distance.

Head up to the building's 40th floor for amazing amenities like a sundeck with grills and seating, library, basketball court, business center, game room with a pool table, and more. Back at your rental, you'll find two cable TVs, a DVD player, and free WiFi for all your entertainment needs. Your suite is equipped with a full kitchen, as well as a private washer and dryer. Central air conditioning keeps everybody cool here.

Book this amazing city retreat today!

* Please be aware that all guests must be at least 25 years of age unless accompanied by parent or legal guardian.

*Outdoor pool open Memorial Day-Labor Day (Weather Permitting)

**PARKING IS NOT INCLUDED IN THE COST OF YOUR STAY** 
There is a parking garage on the bottom floor of this building, but guests are responsible for the cost. Guests bringing vehicles will need to purchase parking passes from LAZ Parking.

City of Chicago License #2209850
summary: This property is a 1210  square feet,  2 Bedroom, 2 bathroom accommodation located in Chicago.  Lakeview suite with private balcony, shared pool, sauna, fitness center, & more! offers 1 Sofa bed, 1 King bed, 1 Queen bed. It can host 6 people.  This accommodation features washer/dryer. Please see the description below or inquire for more details!

description: Admire the dark woods, exposed brick, and handsome built-ins in a renovated flat that pays respect to the home's original craftsmanship and character. Big windows let in lots of light and the private deck off the kitchen is a nice spot to chill-out.

description:
Home of the neon sign visitors and locals know so well, the historic Inn of Chicago Magnificent Mile hotel first opened in 1928 hosting celebs like Bob Hope, Judy Garland, Roy Rogers and showgirls from the Chez Paree supper club. This spacious room features a king sized bed, flat-screen TV and luxurious bath products.

***Your room charge and taxes will be paid prior to your arrival. The Urban Fee of $9.99 will be charged upon arrival at the front desk.  RATES DO NOT INCLUDE PARKING FEES.

The hotel offers comfortably modern rooms in a spot-on location for exploring Chicago’s museums, lakefront and parks. Plus the world-famous Magnificent Mile is right outside your door. Unwind after a day of conquering the sights with a cocktail in the lobby INNbar. Or if the weather’s cooperating, head up the the 22nd floor Skyline Terrace for enviable city views.

Your room will include:
WiFi
Flat-screen TV
Bath amenities
Hairdryer

The space offers:
INNbar
22nd floor Skyline Terrace
Fitness center
Concierge services

Restaurant and fitness center available to guests.

Guest check-in at 24/7 front desk

Magnificent Mile

access: Private entry to entire apartment using door code provided and access to our private country style garden with patio seating and grill in the backyard.
description:
High end comfort in landmark home apartment w/ private garden. Walk to Greek town, Little Italy, Randolph Restaurant Row, UIC, Rush & United Ctr. Walk (25 minutes) to downtown or hop the bus/subway within 2 blocks. Free Street Prkng and daily permit provided for in front of the house. Organic fruit, coffee, tea!

Spacious living area with queen futon couch for extra sleeping in garden level of our landmark home. Both bedrooms have extra comfy queen beds with nice windows. New fully equipped kitchen. We'll have local and organic fruits, coffee & tea for you from our delivery business Irv & Shelly's Fresh Picks, as well as access to ordering online any other fresh groceries to be stocked and waiting for you.

Private entry to entire apartment using door code provided and access to our private country style garden with patio seating and grill in the backyard.

Call or text us anytime! We are happy to share our love for Chicago, favorite restaurants, things to do and of course, answer any questions you have about our great city and getting around.

Walkable residential neighborhood in heart of city. Great restaurants, nice shops on Madison Ave. Tennis, basketball and playgrounds at nearby parks.

Couple blocks to bus lines (#126 and #20) or subway (blue line). Call uber or taxi. Divvy bike share 1 block away. Street parking.

Great transportation access to downtown, airport, local cool neighborhoods and attractions. We can be flexible on Check in and out times if no other guests are leaving/arriving same day. There is a natural geothermal cooling and an AC window unit in each bedroom, as well as fans.

additional_house_rules:
1. CHECK-IN time - after 4pm. CHECK-OUT time before 11 am. 
We can arrange luggage drop off but we can't accept last minute changes, sorry.

2. NO SMOKING anywhere inside the building. You may smoke outside ONLY. 
If there is evidence of smoking indoors you will loose your deposit 
and will be charged for professional odor removal.
No marijuana, no hookah, no drugs.

3. QUIET HOURS  between 10pm-7am.  Please use caution when entering late at night so other guests will not be disturbed. That includes late TV/music sessions.

4. NO SHOES in the house, please. We're taking pride in keeping it extremely clean; vacuumed and mopped before each visit.

5. NO PARTIES, events or gatherings. Only guests included on the reservation are permitted on the premises. Visitors need to get prior owners approval.
Local reservations are subject to further inquiry.

6. KITCHEN. Please, freely use the kitchen but clean it up after each use. 
No dirty dishes should be left in the sink overnight. 
When your garbage can is full, (or max every 3 days!) - please take it out to the black containers behind the garage. Garbage outside the can is unacceptable.
If unit is left excessively dirty, with garbage and food leftovers additional cleaning fee will be charged.
 
7. DAMAGES. If anything gets damaged or broken, please arrange for repair or replacement.

We look forward to be hosting you, but if you are unable to abide by our House Rules, please consider another listing as we reserve the right to end your stay early for serious violations.

Please, respect the place and the others. 
Thank you for your booking & enjoy your stay!

Angelika & Zibi

description:
✅ 10 min to O'Hare, Rosemont & Allstate Arena 
✅ 20 min to Downtown & Wrigley
✅ Free Wifi & Smart TV
✅ Free Street Parking 
✅ Experienced SuperHost - 195+ Reviews
✅ Stylish + Bright + Contemporary Apartment
✅ Bus Stop in Front of the House or Half Mile to Transit Hub
✅ Half Mile to Access Highway I-90
✅ Walking Distance to Convenience Stores & Coffee Shops
✅ Modern Fully Equipped Kitchen
✅ Bedrooms with Fans and AC
✅ Convenient Keyless Check-in & Entry
✅ Safe Area - Police Station Half Mile Away

Freshly gutted, renewed and meticulously decorated unit will be valuable addition to your experience of Chicago. 
Enjoy your morning coffee in bright, spacious kitchen then head out to explore the city...

Entire apartment is fully accessible for guests.  Initial entry from the front will give you access to spacious back staircase, enclosed porch and cozy back yard.
For longer stays (4+) access to washer and dryer will be granted.

We give our guests space but we are available when needed.
Please text with questions or concerns - (847)630-1025

Jefferson Park has long been one of Chicago's transportation hubs, earning the neighborhood the nickname as "The Gateway to Chicago". The neighborhood is served by a Blue Line station in the median of the Kennedy Expressway at the intersection of Milwaukee and Gale Street, less than three blocks away from the Copernicus Center and the historic Jefferson Park Congregational Church. The Union Pacific / Northwest Line also provides service to Jefferson Park.

✅Bus stop in front of the house or 10 min walk to the train station 
✅If you have a car -  just half a mile to access the Highway I-90 and plenty of free parking space on the side streets; Balmoral or Lovejoy.
 Central Ave - not recommended - some parking rules and restrictions might be confusing.

✅✅✅Sign up for Airbnb and get $40 off your first adventure. Here’s our invitation link: https://abnb.me/e/1FH9gwfdBV
house_rules:
1. CHECK-IN time - after 4pm. CHECK-OUT time before 11 am. 
We can arrange luggage drop off but we can't accept last minute changes, sorry.

2. NO SMOKING anywhere inside the building. You may smoke outside ONLY. 
If there is evidence of smoking indoors you will loose your deposit 
and will be charged for professional odor removal.
No marijuana, no hookah, no drugs.

3. QUIET HOURS  between 10pm-7am.  Please use caution when entering late at night so other guests will not be disturbed. That includes late TV/music sessions.

4. NO SHOES in the house, please. We're taking pride in keeping it extremely clean; vacuumed and mopped before each visit.

5. NO PARTIES, events or gatherings. Only guests included on the reservation are permitted on the premises. Visitors need to get prior owners approval.
Local reservations are subject to further inquiry.

6. KITCHEN. Please, freely use the kitchen but clean it up after each use. 
No dirty dishes should be left in the sink overnight. 
When your garbage can is full, (or max every 3 days!) - please take it out to the black containers behind the garage. Garbage outside the can is unacceptable.
If unit is left excessively dirty, with garbage and food leftovers additional cleaning fee will be charged.
 
7. DAMAGES. If anything gets damaged or broken, please arrange for repair or replacement.

We look forward to be hosting you, but if you are unable to abide by our House Rules, please consider another listing as we reserve the right to end your stay early for serious violations.

Please, respect the place and the others. 
Thank you for your booking & enjoy your stay!

Angelika & Zibi

description:
Beautiful room located in a safe and upscale area . New bed, dresser, area for clothing, and lots of light. This wonderful Homestay is an easy walk to downtown Forest Park, Oak Park and River Forest. Located minutes from public transportation! Great space for anyone looking for a clean and comfortable environment. Close to Stroger, Rush, and Loyola! Easy 20 minute ride to downtown on the conveniently close Blue line or Green Line.

Spacious and clean homestay located in the heart of Forest Park we are an ideal spot for all of your travel and work needs! The room is fresh and spacious with clean new bedding and lots of storage.

Wonderful fully stocked kitchen and cozy living space makes this home feel like yours the minute you walk in!

I am available for anything you may need!

The neighborhood is safe and one of a kind. You'll find many delicious restaurants, fun shops and plenty of unique things to check out! We have big city access with small town charm.

Close walk to all forms of public transportation (BLUE LINE - GREEN LINE - CTA BUS - PACE BUS) you'll find it effortless to get to your desired destination! Parking is also available nearby for an additional fee.

additional_house_rules:
House Rules

1. Reservations require a $400 security deposit that is not charged in advance.

2. Guests can cancel free of charge within 24 hours of booking (please contact us to process the refund). You’ll be charged 50% of the booking price (minus the service fee) if you cancel more than seven days before arrival, and 100% of the total price if you cancel within seven days of arrival.

3. Check-in is at 4 pm. Checkout is at 11 am. Early check-in or late checkout may be available upon request. Guests who stay beyond their designated checkout time or delay our housekeeping staff are liable for any associated costs and expenses.

4. Guests are not allowed to make a reservation in their city of residence. Please contact us if you're booking within your city.

5. Smoking, parties, and excessive noise are not allowed, including on balconies and in shared spaces. Smoking violations are subject to a $250 fine plus the cost to clean, deodorize, and repair damages.

6. Commercial photography/videography without written consent, Illegal activity, prostitution, and possession of firearms is strictly prohibited.

7. Overnight guests that exceed the number stated in the reservation are not allowed.

8. Pets are not allowed. Violation of our pet policy may result in a fine. We encourage guests with service animals to contact us before their stay.

9. Guests are responsible for covering the cost to replace lost keys, key cards, fobs, or parking passes.

10. Sonder properties may use video surveillance in public areas. Noise detecting technology may be used inside the suite to monitor excessive noise levels. 

11. Guests take full responsibility for damages, injury, or loss that occur on the premises and its facilities. Guests must report any property damage to customer service. Unreported damages will be deducted from the security deposit.

12. Booking a reservation constitutes an agreement to comply with the House Rules. Guests who violate these rules are liable for any associated damages, fees, costs, or expenses.

description:
Featured in The New York Times, The Wall Street Journal, and Fast Company, we’ve hosted over 350k guests in 2,500+ spaces with an average rating of 4.6 stars. Each space is designed and run by us, so you’ll always know what to expect from your stay. At Sonder, we’ve combined the best parts of home and hotel.

- 24/7 support via text, email, or phone
- Coffee, fresh towels, and bathroom essentials provided
- Hotel-standard cleaning before you arrive
- Self check-in

- In-suite laundry
- Fully-equipped kitchen

South Loop highlights
- Walkability score: 96
- 4 minute walk to Yolk (best breakfast spot)
- 1 minute walk to SX Sky Bar (upscale cocktail bar)

Getting around
- 7 minute walk to Harrison Red Line Station 
- 5 minute walk to downtown
- 31 minute drive to MDW Airport
- 60 minute drive to ORD Airport

The South Loop is a vibrant blend of notable attractions, beautiful parks, and stunning Lake Michigan views. Picnic in the charming green space surrounding Museum Campus, or attend one of the many events at Grant Park such as The Taste of Chicago. Spend the day exploring the countless museums, or journey to the top of the 108-story Willis Tower for breathtaking views of the city.

Access to the amenities is not available at this time.

The number of overnight guests cannot exceed the maximum occupancy. Up to three visitors are allowed during the day.

License: HL 2671122

This is a central location and prone to noise.

2. Guests can cancel free of charge within 24 hours of booking (please contact us to process the refund). You’ll be charged 50% of the booking price (minus the service fee) if you cancel more than seven days before arrival, and 100% of the total price if you cancel within seven days of arrival.

3. Check-in is at 4 pm. Checkout is at 11 am. Early check-in or late checkout may be available upon request. Guests who stay beyond their designated checkout time or delay our housekeeping staff are liable for any associated costs and expenses.

4. Guests are not allowed to make a reservation in their city of residence. Please contact us if you're booking within your city.

5. Smoking, parties, and excessive noise are not allowed, including on balconies and in shared spaces. Smoking violations are subject to a $250 fine plus the cost to clean, deodorize, and repair damages.

6. Commercial photography/videography without written consent, Illegal activity, prostitution, and possession of firearms is strictly prohibited.

7. Overnight guests that exceed the number stated in the reservation are not allowed.

8. Pets are not allowed. Violation of our pet policy may result in a fine. We encourage guests with service animals to contact us before their stay.

9. Guests are responsible for covering the cost to replace lost keys, key cards, fobs, or parking passes.

10. Sonder properties may use video surveillance in public areas. Noise detecting technology may be used inside the suite to monitor excessive noise levels. 

11. Guests take full responsibility for damages, injury, or loss that occur on the premises and its facilities. Guests must report any property damage to customer service. Unreported damages will be deducted from the security deposit.

12. Booking a reservation constitutes an agreement to comply with the House Rules. Guests who violate these rules are liable for any associated damages, fees, costs, or expenses.
neighborhood_overview: The South Loop is a vibrant blend of notable attractions, beautiful parks, and stunning Lake Michigan views. Picnic in the charming green space surrounding Museum Campus, or attend one of the many events at Grant Park such as The Taste of Chicago. Spend the day exploring the countless museums, or journey to the top of the 108-story Willis Tower for breathtaking views of the city.

access:

Security systems throughout the house for guest safety. Cameras inside and outside.
description:
We are located by the Lake Shore Blvd and a 12 minute walk to the Metra Train Station. Enjoy your stay in our home. You will have a private room with a queen sized bed. Closet with hangers and extra storage space in the dresser. 46” Tv with Roku in your room. Private attached bathroom with over sized tub in bedroom. Spectacular room. Lots of closet space. 

Shared office desk available.

55” TV with Roku in the shared Living Room. 

Plenty of free street parking available in front of the home.

-Located on the first floor. 
-queen  Sized Bed comfortably sleeps two. 
-Carpeting in Room and Hard wood in common areas. 
-Private in room accessible Bathroom stocked with shampoo/conditioner, and body wash.
-Kitchen has stove, microwave, fridge, and cooking utensils. All accessible to you at any time.
-Smoking allowed on front porch

The front gate and front door locks with key storage box with code at gate . You will be provided with a code prior to arrival. Please lock doors when arriving and departing. 

Security systems throughout the house for guest safety. Cameras inside and outside.

I am not always on the property, but i am always a call or text away. When I am at home I do like to socialize with the guests.

Jackson Park walk 5 min drive 2 min

access: Guests will have access to the entire place! There are 2 bedrooms with queen sized beds, 2 full bathrooms, 1 loft/office with a pull out futon bed, patio, balcony, and an open concept kitchen, living room and dining area.
description:
Spacious, modern & clean loft on the border of Ukrainian Village/Wicker Park. Come relax and explore one of Chicago's favorite neighborhoods - enjoy a stroll on the 606, a custom cocktail at the Violet Hour, Chicago's favorite tacos at Big Star and cheering the Bulls or Blackhawks. Staying in? Enjoy a private roof and Netflix the night away. Dozens of award-winning restaurants & bars within walking distance. Convenient public transport to O'Hare or downtown, quick bus ride to the United Center.

Modern loft with high ceilings and lots of natural light. Sleeping arrangements: 2 bedrooms with queen beds and 1 pull out futon in loft/office area. 

All hardwood floors except for the bedrooms. Granite counter-tops and modern appliances in the spacious kitchen. Complimentary coffee and in-unit laundry provided! Large balcony access directly off the living room and private lighted rooftop during the summer. 

For work and leisure there is blazing fast 75 mbps wireless internet served through OnHub routing. Alexa integrated room - control lights, temperature and music through voice command. Smart TVs with cable and streaming in both bedrooms and living room. Nest thermostat and smoke/CO detection through Nest Protect.

Guests will have access to the entire place! There are 2 bedrooms with queen sized beds, 2 full bathrooms, 1 loft/office with a pull out futon bed, patio, balcony, and an open concept kitchen, living room and dining area.

Property manager will generally be available on short notice.

Aparment is right in the middle of Wicker Park/Ukrainian village. 

Wicker Park is often described as one of Chicago's creative epicenters. It is famous for unparalleled boutique shopping, esoteric book stores and their countless art galleries. If you have an acute knowledge of craft cocktails and an affinity for independent clothing designers, there's no better area to sip and shop in the country. 

Ukrainian village has significant architecture, including some beautiful Ukrainian Orthodox churches. The main strip, Chicago Avenue is popular for its nightlife and restaurant scene.

Parking spot available. 15 minute walk from Blue Line (Division or Damen stops). 70 bus stops directly outside building for easy access to downtown. Easy access to United Center via the Damen bus line. Divvy Bikes available within 5m walk. Several Zipcars located less than a mile away.

Free, reserved parking spot available in the back of the unit. Will provide instructions on how to enter unit if manager is not available at check in time.
house_rules: Please be respectful of neighbors and noise level, especially after 8-9 PM. No pets or smoking in the apartment (smoking on balcony or rooftop permitted). No extra guests without permission.

additional_house_rules:
No one under age 18 yo
- private message for special consideration prior to booking 

Clean after oneself 
- wash pots/pans/plates immediately after use (teamwork makes the dream work) 
- clean spills/wipe counters after use
- trash can located to left of oven in kitchen
- cleaning supplies under kitchen sink

Pets
- prior approval before booking
- max two
- book each pet as “guest” at guest rate

No parties
- pregame and go 
- come home to pass out 

No additional guest beyond booking #
- will accommodate late additions 
- $20/extra person/availability dependent 

Smoking/420
- allowed on outside patio
- no smoking cigarette inside the apartment

Quiet hours
- 12am to 6am 

Lastly
- Be an adult and remember, the person who booked the reservation is responsible for his/her party and any damages resulting from your stay. 

Ask questions if in doubt, now come on and let’s go see Chicago!

highlights: [{'type': 'LISTING_SUPER_HOST', 'message': 'Superhosts are experienced, highly rated hosts who are committed to providing great stays for guests.', 'headline': 'Ashley is a Superhost'}]
access: Plenty of free street parking with good lighting on side street and front street.
description:
Modest, traditional Chicago style apartment built in 1902. Located at the western end of the Tri-Taylor neighborhood. It is walking distance to UIC, Rush, County, and Mount Sinai Medical centers- and situated between Taylor and Roosevelt. This makes it Easy to drive into the city (2 miles to Willis tower) or hop onto CTA bus (stops in front of the building). Also there are a number of bars and restaurants along both streets that are easily walkable to, w/the first bar across the street from here

Great place for any medical school student, resident physician, or other medical personnel in need of an all-bills-included-furnished apartment for a few weeks up to a couple of months. 

I understand the struggle of completing away rotations and the logistical hardship it places on us. 

Please remember that the living room, kitchen, and bathroom are shared spaces. This is a hostel type situation and you may as up to 5 guests (at guest rate) split between the living room Vinci bed and spare air mattress- availability dependent.

Plenty of free street parking with good lighting on side street and front street.

I’m a medical professional and will be in and out. Any questions are replied to quickly via email or text

...........Nearby hospitals..........

Walking distance (from apartment)

East: 
Jesse Brown VA Hospital  0.5 miles
Stroger “Cook County” hospital  0.9 miles
University of Illinois Hospital  1.0 miles
Rush University Medical Center 1.1 miles 

Southwest: 
Mount Sinai Hospital  0.9 miles
Saint Anthony Hospital  1.5 miles


Some from outside of the medical district

North: 
Norwegian American Hospital  2.6 miles
Saint Elizabeth Hospital  2.8 miles

Northeast:
Advocate Health  4.2 miles
Northwestern Memorial Hospital  4.4 miles
Loyola University Med Center  8.0 miles

South:
Mercy Hospital  4.8 miles 

Southwest:
McNeal Hospital  6.3 miles

Northwest:
Shriner’s children’s hospital  7.9 miles


...............Nearby attractions.............

North East: 
United center 1.2 mile 
The French market 3 miles
Magnificent Mile 5.3 miles 
Lincoln Park Zoo 5.9 miles (free)
Wrigley Field 6.8 miles

East:
Little Italy 1.9 miles 
Willis tower 2.7 miles
Buckingham Fountain 3.8 miles 
Museum Campus (soldier field/museum district/McCormick place) 4 miles
Millennium Park 4.2 miles

South:
Chinatown 3.8 miles
Guarantee Rate Field (white Sox stadium) 3.8 miles

West:
Garfield Conservatory 2.7 miles (free)

Please use the internet for questions, this is not an all inclusive list. I just live here.

Ample/quick Uber, lyft, or taxi services

Divvi City bikes rentals 0.1 miles from apartment 

***   ***   ***   ***   ***   ***   ***   ***   ***   ***   ***
Public transportation 
***Download Ventra app; Use app for bus/train stop locator (uses your location) to find closest stop to you, pay fare, see time tables, and use real time bus/train tracking. 

CTA blue line nearest bus locations
- Roosevelt & Western, 0.1 mile South
  North/South  #49, #X49, #157
  East/West:  #12, #49, #X49, #157
 
- Western & Taylor, 0.1 mile North 
  North/East:  #49, #157
  South: #49
  
Rail Station 
- Blue line train station
  S Western Ave & 290, 0.5 mile North
- Pink line train station
  S Western Ave & Western, 0.9 mile South


***   ***   ***   ***   ***   ***   ***   ***   ***   ***   ***
Parking in the city: multiple options
***Download APPs to AVOID getting towed
 - Park Chicago- mobile app parking meter
    varies $2/hr-$4/hr, time limits
    [meters are free from 10pm- 8am]
 - Spot hero- cheap spots downtown
    best value for parking >1hr and/or difficult
    to park venues/vehicles 
 - Spot Angels- when you question if that
    “Free” parking you found is “actually free”

PET POLICY:
This is a pet friendly location and I do have a small animal as a pet- I do require prior approval before guest with pets arrive. 

I would like to discourage Guests with animal phobias (small animals, dogs, cats...etc) from booking-  to avoid a disappointing experience. 


GUEST RULES:
I would like to reiterate here that it is important for you to familiarize yourself with my guest rules/expectations to insure your happiness/satisfaction with your stay. 



SAFETY:
This area is heavily patrolled by Chicago police department and by UIC campus police making it safer than most areas of Chicago. 

*Remember* Chicago has a reputation for a reason. Use common sense when traveling/walking/interacting with people no matter what part of Chicago you are in.
house_rules:
No one under age 18 yo
- private message for special consideration prior to booking 

Clean after oneself 
- wash pots/pans/plates immediately after use (teamwork makes the dream work) 
- clean spills/wipe counters after use
- trash can located to left of oven in kitchen
- cleaning supplies under kitchen sink

Pets
- prior approval before booking
- max two
- book each pet as “guest” at guest rate

No parties
- pregame and go 
- come home to pass out 

No additional guest beyond booking #
- will accommodate late additions 
- $20/extra person/availability dependent 

Smoking/420
- allowed on outside patio
- no smoking cigarette inside the apartment

Quiet hours
- 12am to 6am 

Lastly
- Be an adult and remember, the person who booked the reservation is responsible for his/her party and any damages resulting from your stay. 

Ask questions if in doubt, now come on and let’s go see Chicago!
interaction: I’m a medical professional and will be in and out. Any questions are replied to quickly via email or text

additional_house_rules:
no shoes inside, so maybe bring some slippers. Be nice and don't have parties or other people not booked here,please...outside on our stoop is a smoking area where you can, if you smoke.really good people watching!!!
Reservations for stays of 14 or more days cannot use the instant book option!!!!
there is no curfew while staying here & no real "rules" except common courtesy (website hidden) especially nice and respectful to other guests- no brainer...
i always want guests to feel as much at home s possible,so feel free to do so.if you need something just ask!
most of all,enjoy your visit here!

access: my home is your home,during your stay!!
description:
Spectacular vintage greystone located on historical,Hoyne ave. in the "artsy" Wicker Park/Ukrainian Village neighborhood.
Easy access to multiple means of public transportation downtown and beyond.

An amazing space in the heart of Wicker Park/Ukrainian Village,Chicago ....Perfect hub for a vacation spot or the business traveler who doesn't want to stay at a stuffy hotel!!! six very close blocks to public transportation(both the Damen and Division st Blue Line stops),great restaurants,bars,clubs,galleries,live music venues etc...conveniently located in the center of this lovely neighborhood yet still on a super quiet,safe and BEAUTIFUL  street! really,it's crazy pretty!

This room is private and serene for sleeping with a small closet to use for your stay.the main space offers wifi,cable tv and and pretty spectacular reading room. there is a second living room and full dining room in the main space for you to make yourself comfortable in. a full old school-ish kitchen are at your disposal if you desire to cook..this is one of three rooms that i list. i do have two a/c units, one of which is portable. If you run hot,please let me know,as i typically do not need it.
i have lived in the area for 20 years and more than welcome to help guide you in your experience here or,leave you to discover on your own!
i love hosting very much as well as travelling  and look forward to sharing my space with you!

my home is your home,during your stay!!

I live here but keep to myself...a quiet and friendly introvert,for sure!sometimes i will bake and have bread/muffins/or sweet treats for guests.ALWAYS have coffee or tea on hand for you. happy to guide you to all that Chicago has to offer during your stay or to leave you be and discover on your own.
Being a shared space, you will also have the potential to interact with other guests if you choose to do so.

my home is located on a gorgeous historic street in the Ukrainian village/wicker park neighborhood...this diverse and bustling neighborhood has so much to offer on it's own but is conveniently located just minutes from the downtown area.

the house is located approximately 6 short blocks to both the Damen & Division Blue Line stops.public transportation here is very efficient, fast and runs 24hrs. also, taxis/ uber are not very pricey if you chose that option.

There is no AC in the room, AC is  portable and available upon request.
I have two adorable,sweet and social kittens, Sam & Mila.
house_rules:
no shoes inside, so maybe bring some slippers. Be nice and don't have parties or other people not booked here,please...outside on our stoop is a smoking area where you can, if you smoke.really good people watching!!!
Reservations for stays of 14 or more days cannot use the instant book option!!!!
there is no curfew while staying here & no real "rules" except common courtesy (website hidden) especially nice and respectful to other guests- no brainer...
i always want guests to feel as much at home s possible,so feel free to do so.if you need something just ask!
most of all,enjoy your visit here!
interaction:
I live here but keep to myself...a quiet and friendly introvert,for sure!sometimes i will bake and have bread/muffins/or sweet treats for guests.ALWAYS have coffee or tea on hand for you. happy to guide you to all that Chicago has to offer during your stay or to leave you be and discover on your own.
Being a shared space, you will also have the potential to interact with other guests if you choose to do so.

description:
Hi! Our place is simple but homey! It can be your home away from home on a business trip, internship, placement, etc. 

This bedroom comes with a large cabinet and closet, desk, small refrigerator, microwave, toaster, and coffeemaker.

There is a kitchen downstairs and full bathroom with shower - both shared spaces. The property is a condo in a nice and quiet neighborhood, walking distance from numerous restaurants, Mariano’s, and gyms.
house_rules:
Guests may use the kitchen but be sure to wash their own dishes.

Guests are also expected to maintain cleanliness of the shared bathroom after they use it - which includes cleaning the shower drain after you shower:)

The first rule is Gratitude to you for choosing The Dickens Place!  :)

There's absolutely No smoking  on premises, but outside is ok. 

No Parties, I live at property lower level and I will NOT allow extra guests or parties be advised.  Don't waste your reservation money as this is strictly monitored. Violation of house rules cancels your reservation at no refund. 

No extra guests brought in after booking amount is set, Only paying guests. allowed in unit, Although a visiting sibling is ok.

Please note, There maybe ID verification at checkin. 


Please ensure you have correct guest count. for example if you note One guest,  there will only be one bed available.  Some guests say 2 guests then 3 show up and no bed available so please be accurate:) I can setup up to 6 beds in both bedrooms (private)  up to 8 in common areas for big groups but you need to let me know. :) 

Please be punctual on checkout time.  Which is 10am at the latest.  Only because other guests await. :) 
Enjoy Chicago! :)

Please try to leave place as you found it.  Except linens and trash we’ll take care of those but if you move anything or use anything please put back to original location as this is a home.

description:
My place is close to Downtown Chicago (via train), Palmer Square, Logan Square, Wicker Park and only a 20 minute train to Millenium Park, Michigan Ave and Museums. 
You’ll love my place because its in the trendiest neighborhood in Chicago, near 24h public transit, the full chef's kitchen, near Hipster nightlife, quick and easy connections to and from Ohare airport (Blue Line CTA). My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, families (with kids), and furry friends (pets).

Entire apt in Logan square central location! Close to everything Chicago has to offer! 

Walk to public trans,  either buses or train. 

A 1000 soft Appartment modern decor spa bath new kitchen with new Appliances stocked with goodies for your stay. 

Although it sleeps 6 comfortably I can house 8 using air beds and futon so if you have a big group Just ask! 

Cable provided with 10 HBO channels also includes
A full dinning room and office with free wifi access. :) 

Luggage holding before and after is available.

Or if you drive all downtown attractions just 15 mins away. ( I90-94)  5 mins away!  To all Chicago has to offer. All Museums, Navy Pier, magnificent Mile shopping, Lake Front, Zoo and great nightlife.

additional_house_rules:
HOUSE RULES

Please review and adhere to the following to avoid penalties and/or cancellation of booking:

-No Drugs; Do not engage in any ILLEGAL activities anywhere on the property; ONLY guests included on the reservation are permitted on the premises. Fines will be issued for breaking these rules (Fine $100-$250).
-If you break or damage something, please let me know and arrange for its replacement or repair.
- The cleaning fee outlined in the profile is included to clean the place after your stay, however, if you leave the place excessively dirty, we may charge up to $100 additionally for the extra work incurred.
-Quiet hours must be observed between 10pm-8am.
-Lost key fee - $300
-Unsalvageable stained linens - $15/pc.
-Unsalvageable stained towels - $10/pc.
-Smoking - $300
-Unauthorized bringing of pets - $300



**-No pets, except dogs & cats. If you have a dog or a cat,  an extra $50 pet cleaning fee will be added to your reservation.

access:
Condo Access is through the front entrance or side door entrances.

Guests will access to the condominium amenities such as fitness center, lobby, laundry, and court yard patio.
description:
Welcome to Chicago! Home of World Series Champs Cubs. Our large 2-bedroom/2 bathroom condo is perfect for getaway to Chicago.   It's professionally designed with modern furniture that gives welcome feeling! We're located 24 minute walk away from Wrigley Field! Also short distance to CTA train and walk to Montrose beach! 20 minute train ride to Downtown Chicago.

Designated parking spot is NOT available, please make other arrangements.  Limited street parking is available.

-The entire condo is for your own use.

-Parking is NOT included in your stay. 

-Professionally designed space with modern furniture.

-43" Flat Screen TV in the living room with Unlimited Netflix streaming.

-Brand new stainless steel appliances in the kitchen, including Fridge, Microwave, & Stove/Oven Range, Dishwasher, Kuerig and Toaster.

-2 Bedrooms available! Bedrooms have large Queen size beds.  Living Room has Full size Sofa Sleeper. Sleeps up to 5 people comfortably!

-Basic Dinnerware, Cutlery, Drinking Glasses, and Pots & Pans provided.

-We provide towels, toilet paper, and shampoo, conditioner, and body wash for your use.

-We have laundry on premise. You may use it at your convenience. Detergent is not provided by host.

Condo Access is through the front entrance or side door entrances.

Guests will access to the condominium amenities such as fitness center, lobby, laundry, and court yard patio.

We are available by phone throughout your stay. You can simply call or text if you have any questions.

Searching for that funky Uptown vibe? Just north of Downtown Chicago, the hip, tree-lined, brick building-filled Uptown neighborhood is where you go if you want a break from the craziness of the city. It’s located right on the water, and it’s just a 5-minute train ride to Wrigley Field (Go Cubs!).

 If you’ll be heading Downtown during your stay, you’re only a 10-minute walk from the Wilson CTA station, which will get you into the city in 30 minutes. You’ll find cozy coffee shops, trendy restaurants, and even a Walgreens nearby.

Need a little caffeine boost to start your Windy City morning? Everybody’s Coffee is a cheery neighborhood coffeehouse known for their sustainable crop-to-cup creations, tasty pastries, and staff smiles - and it’s just a 5-minute walk from our place. And don’t just take our word for it; this java joint was voted one of the five places to go in Chicago by The New York Times, received a shoutout from Conde Nast Traveler as one of the 14 best coffee shops in Chicago, and was voted best coffee shop in Uptown by Time Out Chicago.

Wandering around Chi-Town will definitely work up an appetite, so meander on over to the The Reservoir if you’re craving a tasty American meal. Here you will find upscale pub food like craft burgers, charcuterie boards, and small bar bites. With a rotating list of beers (including lots of local brews!), you might just find your new favorite bottle of suds. 

In the mood for something delicious and nutritious? Head next door to Loving Heart Vegan Cafe. This cozy eatery serves up all-vegan dishes including wraps, salads, burgers, and soups. Their scrumptious sweets will also have you questioning whether or not they are actually vegan (they are). And that means they must be healthy, so treat yourself!

Craving cracker jacks? You’re in luck! Wrigley Field is just a 7-minute train ride from Wilson Station. Or, give your legs a pre-seventh inning stretch and walk down N Sheridan Road - it will only take 25 minutes.

If you’re up for a relaxing walk over the weekend, you can’t miss the Peace Garden. This landscaped park will give you the perfect backdrop to unwind and catch some fresh air. Then head over to Montrose Point Bird Sanctuary for some serious nature sounds. Here you can find a variety of migrating songbirds while admiring the Chicago’s classic skyline. Montrose Beach is also a perfect location for a weekend picnic.

Hop on the Red Line at Wilson Station and you’re only a 20-minute train ride from the city’s bustling Magnificent Mile. This iconic Chicago district is complete with upscale shops and posh restaurants. One of our favorite little jewels of this area is Gino’s East. This long-running pizzeria fires up authentic deep dish and thin crust pizza, and may just be one of the city’s finest. Their pizzas are so popular they even offer nationwide shipping for those who can’t get enough (we’re not kidding). Now, that’s amore! You can enjoy a local classic and add your name on their wall of signatures.

Walking, taking the train, and using rideshare services (Uber and Lyft) are our recommended modes of transport. Unless you like paying for overpriced parking garages!

Wilson CTA train station is a nice 10-minute walk from our place. The train can then take you directly into downtown in just 30 minutes, which gives you plenty of time to browse the morning news while sipping on your latte. Or give your friends back home a serious case of FOMO by sharing some scenic Windy City shots.

Limited street parking is available, but not reliable, so we don’t recommend renting a car. However, Uber and Lyft are always an option for those looking to ride in style and venture a little further around town.

-Access to the unit is through an elevator to the 4th floor.

-There are many units inside this building.

-Please be aware If you lose the key and entry fob, which is your access to the entire building, it can not be replaced for you immediately and you may lose access to the apartment unit and all amenities until another one can be made.  There is a $300 fee for losing key and entry fob.

There is limited street parking. I recommend using "spot hero" app and claim parking near by for your stay. You can access the whole city through the CTA train near by.

-All guests need to be attentive to the house rules during their stay, as they are other tenants at the property.

-Bath towels are provided per number of guest not per number of stay
-Washcloths are not provided during your stay. You may send me a message though if you need them and I'll try my best to accommodate your request.
-We have duvet covers on our beddings  (no top sheets).
-A Security Deposit may be required on some bookings. 
-If there's an issue during your stay, please report it real time so we can address it right away.
house_rules:
HOUSE RULES

Please review and adhere to the following to avoid penalties and/or cancellation of booking:

-No Drugs; Do not engage in any ILLEGAL activities anywhere on the property; ONLY guests included on the reservation are permitted on the premises. Fines will be issued for breaking these rules (Fine $100-$250).
-If you break or damage something, please let me know and arrange for its replacement or repair.
- The cleaning fee outlined in the profile is included to clean the place after your stay, however, if you leave the place excessively dirty, we may charge up to $100 additionally for the extra work incurred.
-Quiet hours must be observed between 10pm-8am.

-Unsalvageable stained linens - $15/pc.
-Unsalvageable stained towels - $10/pc.
-Smoking - $300
-Unauthorized bringing of pets - $300



**-No pets, except dogs & cats. If you have a dog or a cat,  an extra $50 pet cleaning fee will be added to your reservation.
interaction: We are available by phone throughout your stay. You can simply call or text if you have any questions.
neighborhood_overview:
Searching for that funky Uptown vibe? Just north of Downtown Chicago, the hip, tree-lined, brick building-filled Uptown neighborhood is where you go if you want a break from the craziness of the city. It’s located right on the water, and it’s just a 5-minute train ride to Wrigley Field (Go Cubs!).

 If you’ll be heading Downtown during your stay, you’re only a 10-minute walk from the Wilson CTA station, which will get you into the city in 30 minutes. You’ll find cozy coffee shops, trendy restaurants, and even a Walgreens nearby.

Need a little caffeine boost to start your Windy City morning? Everybody’s Coffee is a cheery neighborhood coffeehouse known for their sustainable crop-to-cup creations, tasty pastries, and staff smiles - and it’s just a 5-minute walk from our place. And don’t just take our word for it; this java joint was voted one of the five places to go in Chicago by The New York Times, received a shoutout from Conde Nast Traveler as one of the 14 best coffee shops in Chicago, and was voted best coffee shop in Uptown by Time Out Chicago.

Wandering around Chi-Town will definitely work up an appetite, so meander on over to the The Reservoir if you’re craving a tasty American meal. Here you will find upscale pub food like craft burgers, charcuterie boards, and small bar bites. With a rotating list of beers (including lots of local brews!), you might just find your new favorite bottle of suds. 

In the mood for something delicious and nutritious? Head next door to Loving Heart Vegan Cafe. This cozy eatery serves up all-vegan dishes including wraps, salads, burgers, and soups. Their scrumptious sweets will also have you questioning whether or not they are actually vegan (they are). And that means they must be healthy, so treat yourself!

Craving cracker jacks? You’re in luck! Wrigley Field is just a 7-minute train ride from Wilson Station. Or, give your legs a pre-seventh inning stretch and walk down N Sheridan Road - it will only take 25 minutes.

If you’re up for a relaxing walk over the weekend, you can’t miss the Peace Garden. This landscaped park will give you the perfect backdrop to unwind and catch some fresh air. Then head over to Montrose Point Bird Sanctuary for some serious nature sounds. Here you can find a variety of migrating songbirds while admiring the Chicago’s classic skyline. Montrose Beach is also a perfect location for a weekend picnic.

Hop on the Red Line at Wilson Station and you’re only a 20-minute train ride from the city’s bustling Magnificent Mile. This iconic Chicago district is complete with upscale shops and posh restaurants. One of our favorite little jewels of this area is Gino’s East. This long-running pizzeria fires up authentic deep dish and thin crust pizza, and may just be one of the city’s finest. Their pizzas are so popular they even offer nationwide shipping for those who can’t get enough (we’re not kidding). Now, that’s amore! You can enjoy a local classic and add your name on their wall of signatures.

-The entire condo is for your own use.

-Parking is NOT included in your stay. 

-Professionally designed space with modern furniture.

-43" Flat Screen TV in the living room with Unlimited Netflix streaming.

-Brand new stainless steel appliances in the kitchen, including Fridge, Microwave, & Stove/Oven Range, Dishwasher, Kuerig and Toaster.

-2 Bedrooms available! Bedrooms have large Queen size beds.  Living Room has Full size Sofa Sleeper. Sleeps up to 5 people comfortably!

-Basic Dinnerware, Cutlery, Drinking Glasses, and Pots & Pans provided.

-We provide towels, toilet paper, and shampoo, conditioner, and body wash for your use.

-We have laundry on premise. You may use it at your convenience. Detergent is not provided by host.
summary:
Welcome to Chicago! Home of World Series Champs Cubs. Our large 2-bedroom/2 bathroom condo is perfect for getaway to Chicago.   It's professionally designed with modern furniture that gives welcome feeling! We're located 24 minute walk away from Wrigley Field! Also short distance to CTA train and walk to Montrose beach! 20 minute train ride to Downtown Chicago.

Designated parking spot is NOT available, please make other arrangements.  Limited street parking is available.

access:
As an "Entire home" reservation, you'll have the ENTIRE studio to yourselves. Enjoy the privacy and luxury of this unique experience :)
All amenities shown in the pictures are available to guests, including gym and pool.
description:
Located in the heart of the beautiful River North neighborhood, this studio has everything you need to experience the wonders of Chicago city. It’s walking distance from cafes, restaurants, bars, galleries, shopping centres and local stores, parks and public transportation. Very close to the subway & train station, you will be able to explores all attractions and go shopping in the best stores, well at your doorstep.

Our studio apartment is totally private and have an open concept.  You can relax on comfortable furniture and sunbathe on summer days in the pool available for guests through the building. Inside you will find a comfortable queen-sized bed, a complete kitchen, and a lovely bathroom with the essential amenities. There is a table for your meals that is convertible in a place for work. The WiFi has high-speed internet, and in the living room there is a flat screen TV with Netflix, which you can watch while unwinding in the sofa (that can be convertible in a single bed). There is a full closet with adequate room for coats and clothes storage as well.

As an "Entire home" reservation, you'll have the ENTIRE studio to yourselves. Enjoy the privacy and luxury of this unique experience :)
All amenities shown in the pictures are available to guests, including gym and pool.

We are available to answer any questions/concerns you have and we will give you hand over the Key/FOB set in your check-in. From there, we will be at your disposal to answer any additional questions you may have via text, Airbnb platform or phone.

If you need any adjust in the apartment or find something missing,  just let us know. We can call maintenance to solve or assist you anytime, always thinking in make this experience very comfortable for you!

additional_house_rules:
Check-in time is 3PM - 12AM (midnight) Self check-in with keypad
Check out by 11AM 

*HOUSE RULES* 
Please read carefully to avoid any Cancellation of Reservation or fines

-No shoes. Please remove shoes upon arrival.
-No smoking. If you smoke inside the unit or property, we will cancel your reservation and we will fine you for $200 for damages.
-No Drugs (including Marijuana).
-Do not engage in any ILLEGAL activities anywhere on the property.
-No Parties or events, No outside visitors, and No overnight guests without previous approval from your host.
-Any approved additional overnight guests must pay the extra person fee outlined on our AirBnB profile.
-No pets, except Dogs & Cats are allowed.
-If you have pets an extra $50 dollar cleaning fee will be added to your reservation -Bathroom is meant for Shower Use Only.
-All food items should be stored in designated food areas and not left out, to avoid pests.
-Use kitchen freely but clean up any mess that is created, including dishes, counters, stove, microwave; no dirty dishes should be left in the sink overnight.
-If you break or damage something, please let me know and arrange for its replacement or repair.
-Some cleaning is required before you check out. Please ensure dishes are washed, furniture that is moved is put back, and trash is thrown out. The cleaning fee outlined in the profile is included to clean the place after your stay, however if you leave the place excessively dirty, with dirty dishes and garbage everywhere, that requires more cleaning, we may charge up to $100 additionally for the extra work incurred. -Quiet hours must be observed between 10pm-8am.
-Other things to note  -All guests need to be attentive to the house rules during their stay, as we have other tenants at the property.  -Neighbors have called and will call the police for any guests who do any illegal activities, including smoking Marijuana on the premise.
-We have STRICT rules against noise, music, and/or partying and have cancelled reservations due to complaints in the past.
